GE07mbh_09_u:1: 09,001.000*0001_02 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_09_u:4: 09,001.001c alpāvaśiṣṭāḥ kuravaḥ kim akurvata vai dvija
GE07mbh_09_u:5: 09,001.002a udīryamāṇaṃ ca balaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā suyodhanaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:8: 09,001.003c na hi tṛpyāmi pūrveṣāṃ śṛṇvānaś caritaṃ mahat

GE07mbh_09_u:26: 09,001.011c apasṛtya hradaṃ ghoraṃ viveśa ripujād bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:30: 09,001.013a tasmin hate maheṣvāse hataśiṣṭās trayo rathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:37: 09,001.015a praviśya ca puraṃ tūrṇaṃ bhujāv ucchritya duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:39: 09,001.016a ruroda ca naravyāghra hā rājann iti duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:40: 09,001.016c aho bata vivignāḥ sma nidhanena mahātmanaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:42: 09,001.017b*0006_01 vidhis tu balavān atra pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam
GE07mbh_09_u:44: 09,001.018a dṛṣṭvaiva ca puro rājañ janaḥ sarvaḥ sa saṃjayam
GE07mbh_09_u:46: 09,001.018c praruroda bhṛśodvigno hā rājann iti sasvaram
GE07mbh_09_u:47: 09,001.019a ākumāraṃ naravyāghra tat puraṃ vai samantataḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:49: 09,001.020a dhāvataś cāpy apaśyac ca tatra trīn puruṣarṣabhān
GE07mbh_09_u:52: 09,001.021a tathā sa vihvalaḥ sūtaḥ praviśya nṛpatikṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:56: 09,001.023a tathānyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca jñātibhiś ca hitaiṣibhiḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:64: 09,001.026a saṃśaptakā hatāḥ sarve kāmbojāś ca śakaiḥ saha

GE07mbh_09_u:66: 09,001.027a prācyā hatā mahārāja dākṣiṇātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:67: 09,001.027c udīcyā nihatāḥ sarve pratīcyāś ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:68: 09,001.027e rājāno rājaputrāś ca sarvato nihatā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:69: 09,001.028a duryodhano hato rājan yathoktaṃ pāṇḍavena ca

GE07mbh_09_u:72: 09,001.028d*0010_02 sa bhūmau patitaḥ śete pāṃśubhiḥ pariguṇṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:75: 09,001.030a pāñcālāś ca naravyāghrāś cedayaś ca niṣūditāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:76: 09,001.030c tava putrā hatāḥ sarve draupadeyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:78: 09,001.031a narā vinihatāḥ sarve gajāś ca vinipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:79: 09,001.031c rathinaś ca naravyāghra hayāś ca nihatā yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:80: 09,001.032a kiṃciccheṣaṃ ca śibiraṃ tāvakānāṃ kṛtaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:82: 09,001.033a prāyaḥ strīśeṣam abhavaj jagat kālena mohitam
GE07mbh_09_u:83: 09,001.033c sapta pāṇḍavataḥ śeṣā dhārtarāṣṭrās tathā trayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:84: 09,001.034a te caiva bhrātaraḥ pañca vāsudevo 'tha sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:85: 09,001.034c kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca drauṇiś ca jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:88: 09,001.035e ete śeṣā mahārāja sarve 'nye nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:89: 09,001.036a kālena nihataṃ sarvaṃ jagad vai bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:90: 09,001.036c duryodhanaṃ vai purataḥ kṛtvā vairasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:91: 09,001.037a etac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:95: 09,001.039a gāndhārī ca nṛpaśreṣṭha sarvāś ca kuruyoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:96: 09,001.039c patitāḥ sahasā bhūmau śrutvā krūraṃ vacaś ca tāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:98: 09,001.040c pralāpayuktā mahatī kathā nyastā paṭe yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:99: 09,001.041a kṛcchreṇa tu tato rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:101: 09,001.042a labdhvā tu sa nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ vepamānaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:102: 09,001.042c udīkṣya ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ kṣattāraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:103: 09,001.043a vidvan kṣattar mahāprājña tvaṃ gatir bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:105: 09,001.043e evam uktvā tato bhūyo visaṃjño nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_09_u:106: 09,001.044a taṃ tathā patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāndhavā ye 'sya ke cana
GE07mbh_09_u:107: 09,001.044c śītais tu siṣicus toyair vivyajur vyajanair api
GE07mbh_09_u:108: 09,001.045a sa tu dīrgheṇa kālena pratyāśvasto mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:110: 09,001.045e niḥśvasañ jihmaga iva kumbhakṣipto viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_09_u:112: 09,001.046c tathā sarvāḥ striyaś caiva gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_09_u:113: 09,001.047a tato dīrgheṇa kālena viduraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:115: 09,001.048a gacchantu yoṣitaḥ sarvā gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_09_u:116: 09,001.048c tatheme suhṛdaḥ sarve bhraśyate me mano bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:117: 09,001.049a evam uktas tataḥ kṣattā tāḥ striyo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:118: 09,001.049c visarjayām āsa śanair vepamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:119: 09,001.050a niścakramus tataḥ sarvās tāḥ striyo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:120: 09,001.050c suhṛdaś ca tataḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā rājānam āturam
GE07mbh_09_u:122: 09,001.051b*0011_01 gatir me ko bhaved adya iti cintāsamākulaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:124: 09,001.052a prāñjalir niḥśvasantaṃ ca taṃ narendraṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:125: 09,001.052b*0012_01 jñātīn striyo 'tha niryāpya praviśya viduraḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:126: 09,001.052b*0012_02 rājānaṃ śocamānas tu taṃ śocantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:131: 09,002.002a sadhūmam iva niḥśvasya karau dhunvan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:132: 09,002.002c vicintya ca mahārāja tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:134: 09,002.003a aho bata mahad duḥkhaṃ yad ahaṃ pāṇḍavān raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:135: 09,002.003c kṣemiṇaś cāvyayāṃś caiva tvattaḥ sūta śṛṇomi vai
GE07mbh_09_u:137: 09,002.004c yac chrutvā nihatān putrān dīryate na sahasradhā
GE07mbh_09_u:138: 09,002.005a cintayitvā vacas teṣāṃ bālakrīḍāṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:139: 09,002.005c adya śrutvā hatān putrān bhṛśaṃ me dīryate manaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:140: 09,002.006a andhatvād yadi teṣāṃ tu na me rūpanidarśanam
GE07mbh_09_u:142: 09,002.007a bālabhāvam atikrāntān yauvanasthāṃś ca tān aham
GE07mbh_09_u:143: 09,002.007c madhyaprāptāṃs tathā śrutvā hṛṣṭa āsaṃ tathānagha
GE07mbh_09_u:144: 09,002.008a tān adya nihatāñ śrutvā hṛtaiśvaryān hṛtaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:145: 09,002.008c na labhe vai kva cic chāntiṃ putrādhibhir abhiplutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:146: 09,002.009a ehy ehi putra rājendra mamānāthasya sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_09_u:147: 09,002.009c tvayā hīno mahābāho kāṃ nu yāsyāmy ahaṃ gatim
GE07mbh_09_u:148: 09,002.010a gatir bhūtvā mahārāja jñātīnāṃ suhṛdāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:149: 09,002.010c andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca māṃ vīra vihāya kva nu gacchasi
GE07mbh_09_u:150: 09,002.011a sā kṛpā sā ca te prītiḥ sā ca rājan sumānitā
GE07mbh_09_u:152: 09,002.012a kathaṃ tvaṃ pṛthivīpālān bhuktvā tāta samāgatān
GE07mbh_09_u:153: 09,002.012c śeṣe vinihato bhūmau prākṛtaḥ kunṛpo yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:154: 09,002.013a ko nu mām utthitaṃ kālye tāta tāteti vakṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:157: 09,002.014c anuśādhīti kauravya tat sādhu vada me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:158: 09,002.015a nanu nāmāham aśrauṣaṃ vacanaṃ tava putraka
GE07mbh_09_u:159: 09,002.015c bhūyasī mama pṛthvīyaṃ yathā pārthasya no tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:162: 09,002.017a aśvatthāmā ca bhojaś ca māgadhaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:163: 09,002.017c bṛhadbalaś ca kāśīśaḥ śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:164: 09,002.018a mlecchāś ca bahusāhasrāḥ śakāś ca yavanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:167: 09,002.019c śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca śatāyuś cāpi vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:170: 09,002.021a ete cānye ca bahavo rājāno rājasattama
GE07mbh_09_u:171: 09,002.021c madartham udyatāḥ sarve prāṇāṃs tyaktvā raṇe prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:172: 09,002.022a yeṣāṃ madhye sthito yuddhe bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:173: 09,002.022c yodhayiṣyāmy ahaṃ pārthān pāñcālāṃś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:174: 09,002.023a cedīṃś ca nṛpaśārdūla draupadeyāṃś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:175: 09,002.023c sātyakiṃ kuntibhojaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ ca ghaṭotkacam
GE07mbh_09_u:178: 09,002.024e kiṃ punaḥ sahitā vīrāḥ kṛtavairāś ca pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:180: 09,002.025c yotsyanti saha rājendra haniṣyanti ca tān mṛdhe
GE07mbh_09_u:181: 09,002.026a karṇas tv eko mayā sārdhaṃ nihaniṣyati pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:182: 09,002.026c tato nṛpatayo vīrāḥ sthāsyanti mama śāsane
GE07mbh_09_u:183: 09,002.027a yaś ca teṣāṃ praṇetā vai vāsudevo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:184: 09,002.027c na sa saṃnahyate rājann iti mām abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:185: 09,002.028a tasyāhaṃ vadataḥ sūta bahuśo mama saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_09_u:186: 09,002.028c yuktito hy anupaśyāmi nihatān pāṇḍavān mṛdhe
GE07mbh_09_u:187: 09,002.029a teṣāṃ madhye sthitā yatra hanyante mama putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:189: 09,002.030a bhīṣmaś ca nihato yatra lokanāthaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:192: 09,002.031c nihataḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saṃkhye kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:193: 09,002.031d*0014_01 karṇaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye divyāstrajño mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:194: 09,002.032a bhūriśravā hato yatra somadattaś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:195: 09,002.032c bāhlīkaś ca mahārāja kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:197: 09,002.032d*0015_02 jayadrathaś ca nihataḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:198: 09,002.033a sudakṣiṇo hato yatra jalasaṃdhaś ca kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:199: 09,002.033c śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:201: 09,002.033d*0016_02 nihataḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saṃkhye kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:202: 09,002.034a bṛhadbalo hato yatra māgadhaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:204: 09,002.034b*0018_01 śatāyuś caiva vikrāntaḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:205: 09,002.034c āvantyo nihato yatra trigartaś ca janādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:206: 09,002.034e saṃśaptakāś ca bahavaḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:208: 09,002.034f*0019_02 trigartaś ca mahābāhuḥ saṃśaptāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:211: 09,002.035a alaṃbusas tathā rājan rākṣasaś cāpy alāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:212: 09,002.035c ārśyaśṛṅgaś ca nihataḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:214: 09,002.036c mlecchāś ca bahusāhasrāḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:215: 09,002.037a śakuniḥ saubalo yatra kaitavyaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:216: 09,002.037c nihataḥ sabalo vīraḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:217: 09,002.037d*0021_01 ete cānye ca bahavaḥ kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:219: 09,002.038c nihatā bahavo yatra kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:224: 09,002.039c nihatāḥ samare sarve kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:225: 09,002.040a putrāś ca me vinihatāḥ pautrāś caiva mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:226: 09,002.040b*0025_01 duryodhano hato yatra putraś cāsya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:227: 09,002.040c vayasyā bhrātaraś caiva kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:228: 09,002.040d*0026_01 pārthena saṃyuge ghore kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:230: 09,002.041c yaś ca bhāgyasamāyuktaḥ sa śubhaṃ prāpnuyān naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:231: 09,002.042a ahaṃ viyuktaḥ svair bhāgyaiḥ putraiś caiveha saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:232: 09,002.042c katham adya bhaviṣyāmi vṛddhaḥ śatruvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:233: 09,002.043a nānyad atra paraṃ manye vanavāsād ṛte prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:235: 09,002.044a na hi me 'nyad bhavec chreyo vanābhyupagamād ṛte
GE07mbh_09_u:237: 09,002.045a duryodhano hato yatra śalyaś ca nihato yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:238: 09,002.045c duḥśāsano viśastaś ca vikarṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:239: 09,002.046a kathaṃ hi bhīmasenasya śroṣye 'haṃ śabdam uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:240: 09,002.046c ekena samare yena hataṃ putraśataṃ mama
GE07mbh_09_u:246: 09,002.049c dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya cintayitvā parābhavam
GE07mbh_09_u:249: 09,002.051a bhīṣmadroṇau hatau śrutvā sūtaputraṃ ca pātitam
GE07mbh_09_u:251: 09,002.051d*0027_01 tathā śalyaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ madrāṇām īśvaraṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_09_u:252: 09,002.052a yaṃ yaṃ senāpraṇetāraṃ yudhi kurvanti māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:253: 09,002.052c acireṇaiva kālena taṃ taṃ nighnanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:254: 09,002.053a raṇamūrdhni hato bhīṣmaḥ paśyatāṃ vaḥ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_09_u:255: 09,002.053c evam eva hato droṇaḥ sarveṣām eva paśyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:256: 09,002.054a evam eva hataḥ karṇaḥ sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:257: 09,002.054c sa rājakānāṃ sarveṣāṃ paśyatāṃ vaḥ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_09_u:258: 09,002.055a pūrvam evāham ukto vai vidureṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:260: 09,002.056a ke cin na samyak paśyanti mūḍhāḥ samyak tathāpare
GE07mbh_09_u:261: 09,002.056c tad idaṃ mama mūḍhasya tathābhūtaṃ vacaḥ sma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:262: 09,002.057a yad abravīn me dharmātmā viduro dīrghadarśivān
GE07mbh_09_u:265: 09,002.058c anayasya phalaṃ tasya brūhi gāvalgaṇe punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:266: 09,002.059a ko vā mukham anīkānām āsīt karṇe nipātite
GE07mbh_09_u:267: 09,002.059c arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca ko vā pratyudyayau rathī
GE07mbh_09_u:269: 09,002.060c vāmaṃ ca yoddhukāmasya ke vā vīrasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:270: 09,002.061a kathaṃ ca vaḥ sametānāṃ madrarājo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:271: 09,002.061c nihataḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saṃkhye putro vā mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:273: 09,002.062c yathā ca nihataḥ saṃkhye putro duryodhano mama
GE07mbh_09_u:274: 09,002.063a pāñcālāś ca yathā sarve nihatāḥ sapadānugāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:275: 09,002.063c dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca draupadyāḥ pañca cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:276: 09,002.064a pāṇḍavāś ca yathā muktās tathobhau sātvatau yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:277: 09,002.064c kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca bhāradvājasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:278: 09,002.065a yad yathā yādṛśaṃ caiva yuddhaṃ vṛttaṃ ca sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_09_u:279: 09,002.065c akhilaṃ śrotum icchāmi kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:281: 09,003.001a śṛṇu rājann avahito yathā vṛtto mahān kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:286: 09,003.002d@001_0002 yat tat karṇe hate pārthaḥ siṃhanādam athākarot
GE07mbh_09_u:287: 09,003.002d@001_0003 tadā tava sutān rājan prāviśat sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_09_u:288: 09,003.002d@001_0004 na saṃdhātum anīkāni na caivātha parākrame
GE07mbh_09_u:289: 09,003.002d@001_0005 āsīd buddhir hate karṇe tava yodhasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_09_u:290: 09,003.002d@001_0006 vaṇijo nāvi bhinnāyām agādhe viplavā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:291: 09,003.002d@001_0007 apāre pāram icchanto hate dvīpe kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_09_u:293: 09,003.002d@001_0009 anāthā nātham icchanto mṛgāḥ siṃhārditā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:297: 09,003.002d@001_0013 sūtaputre hate rājan putrās te prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:300: 09,003.002d@001_0016 mām eva nūnaṃ bībhatsur mām eva ca vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:301: 09,003.002d@001_0017 abhiyātīti manvānāḥ petur mamluś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:302: 09,003.002d@001_0018 hayān anye gajān anye rathān anye mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:304: 09,003.002d@001_0020 kuñjaraiḥ syandanā bhagnāḥ sādinaś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:309: 09,003.002d@001_0025 sarvaṃ pārthamayaṃ lokam apaśyan vai bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:313: 09,003.002d@001_0029 jaghane yudhyamānaṃ māṃ tūrṇam aśvān pracodaya
GE07mbh_09_u:314: 09,003.002d@001_0030 samare yudhyamānaṃ hi kaunteyo māṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:317: 09,003.002d@001_0033 nihatya śiṣṭāñ śatrūṃś ca karṇasyānṛṇyam āpnuyām
GE07mbh_09_u:322: 09,003.002d@001_0038 tān bhīmasenaḥ saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:326: 09,003.002d@001_0042 akrudhyata raṇe bhīmas tair mṛdhe pratyavasthitaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:328: 09,003.002d@001_0044 na tān rathastho bhūmiṣṭhān dharmāpekṣī vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:333: 09,003.002d@001_0049 bhīmam abhyadravan saṃkhye pataṃgā jvalanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:336: 09,003.002d@001_0052 śyenavad vyacarad bhīmaḥ khaḍgena gadayā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:341: 09,003.002d@001_0057 mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:343: 09,003.002d@001_0059 tasyāśvavārān subahūṃs te nihatya śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:344: 09,003.002d@001_0060 tam anvadhāvaṃs tvaritās tatra yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_09_u:346: 09,003.002d@001_0062 viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gāṇḍīvaṃ vyākṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:348: 09,003.002d@001_0064 arjunaṃ cāpi yoddhāraṃ tvadīyāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:356: 09,003.002d@001_0072 dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā tvadīyāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:359: 09,003.002d@001_0075 cekitānaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca draupadeyāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:360: 09,003.002d@001_0076 hatvā tvadīyaṃ sumahat sainyaṃ śaṅkhān athādhaman
GE07mbh_09_u:361: 09,003.002d@001_0077 te sarve tāvakān prekṣya dravato vai parāṅmukhān
GE07mbh_09_u:362: 09,003.002d@001_0078 abhyadhāvanta nighnanto vṛṣāñ jitvā vṛṣā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:363: 09,003.002d@001_0079 senāvaśeṣaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:365: 09,003.002d@001_0081 tata enaṃ śarai rājan sahasā samavākirat
GE07mbh_09_u:366: 09,003.002d@001_0082 rajasā codgatenātha na sma kiṃ cana dṛśyate
GE07mbh_09_u:368: 09,003.002d@001_0084 diśaḥ sarvā mahārāja tāvakāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:372: 09,003.002d@001_0088 yuddhāya bharataśreṣṭha devān iva purā baliḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:375: 09,003.002d@001_0091 duryodhano 'py asaṃbhrāntas tān arīn vyadhamac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:377: 09,003.002d@001_0093 yad enaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve na śekur ativartitum
GE07mbh_09_u:381: 09,003.002d@001_0097 harṣayann iva tān yodhān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:382: 09,003.002d@001_0098 na taṃ deśaṃ prapaśyāmi pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu ca
GE07mbh_09_u:383: 09,003.002d@001_0099 yatra yātān na vo hanyuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:384: 09,003.002d@001_0100 svalpaṃ caiva balaṃ teṣāṃ kṛṣṇau ca bhṛśavikṣatau
GE07mbh_09_u:385: 09,003.002d@001_0101 yadi sarve 'tra tiṣṭhāmo dhruvo no vijayo bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:386: 09,003.002d@001_0102 viprayātāṃs tu vo bhinnān pāṇḍavāḥ kṛtakilbiṣān
GE07mbh_09_u:387: 09,003.002d@001_0103 anusṛtya haniṣyanti śreyo naḥ samare vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:389: 09,003.002d@001_0105 mṛto duḥkhaṃ na jānīte pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_09_u:390: 09,003.002d@001_0106 śṛṇvantu kṣatriyāḥ sarve yāvanto vai samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:391: 09,003.002d@001_0107 dviṣato bhīmasenasya kruddhasya vaśam eṣy atha
GE07mbh_09_u:392: 09,003.002d@001_0108 pitāmahair ācaritaṃ na dharmaṃ hātum arhatha
GE07mbh_09_u:393: 09,003.002d@001_0109 na hi karmāsti pāpīyaḥ kṣatriyasya palāyanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:394: 09,003.002d@001_0110 na yuddhadharmāc chreyān hi panthāḥ svargasya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:396: 09,003.002d@001_0112 tasya tad vacanaṃ rājñaḥ pūjayitvā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:399: 09,003.002d@001_0115 tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ punar eva sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:404: 09,003.003b*0028_01 pātiteṣu turaṃgeṣu gajeṣu ca ratheṣu ca
GE07mbh_09_u:409: 09,003.005c patitān rathanīḍāṃś ca rathāṃś cāpi mahātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:410: 09,003.006a raṇe vinihatān nāgān dṛṣṭvā pattīṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:416: 09,003.009a duryodhana nibodhedaṃ yat tvā vakṣyāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_09_u:417: 09,003.009c śrutvā kuru mahārāja yadi te rocate 'nagha
GE07mbh_09_u:418: 09,003.010a na yuddhadharmāc chreyān vai panthā rājendra vidyate
GE07mbh_09_u:420: 09,003.011a putro bhrātā pitā caiva svasreyo mātulas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:422: 09,003.012a vadhe caiva paro dharmas tathādharmaḥ palāyane
GE07mbh_09_u:423: 09,003.012c te sma ghorāṃ samāpannā jīvikāṃ jīvitārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:424: 09,003.013a tatra tvāṃ prativakṣyāmi kiṃ cid eva hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:425: 09,003.013c hate bhīṣme ca droṇe ca karṇe caiva mahārathe
GE07mbh_09_u:426: 09,003.014a jayadrathe ca nihate tava bhrātṛṣu cānagha
GE07mbh_09_u:427: 09,003.014c lakṣmaṇe tava putre ca kiṃ śeṣaṃ paryupāsmahe
GE07mbh_09_u:428: 09,003.015a yeṣu bhāraṃ samāsajya rājye matim akurmahi
GE07mbh_09_u:429: 09,003.015c te saṃtyajya tanūr yātāḥ śūrā brahmavidāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_09_u:430: 09,003.016a vayaṃ tv iha vinābhūtā guṇavadbhir mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:432: 09,003.017a sarvair api ca jīvadbhir bībhatsur aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:437: 09,003.019c gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣāt saṃhṛṣyanti manāṃsi naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:441: 09,003.021c dṛśyate dikṣu sarvāsu vidyud abhraghaneṣv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:443: 09,003.021d*0029_02 pibanta iva cākāśaṃ rathe yuktās tu vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:446: 09,003.022c tāvakaṃ tad balaṃ rājann arjuno 'stravidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:450: 09,003.024a vikṣobhayantaṃ senāṃ te trāsayantaṃ ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_09_u:452: 09,003.025a trāsayantaṃ tathā yodhān dhanur ghoṣeṇa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:453: 09,003.025c bhūya enam apaśyāma siṃhaṃ mṛgagaṇā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:460: 09,003.029a tāṃ nāvam iva paryastāṃ bhrāntavātāṃ mahārṇave
GE07mbh_09_u:462: 09,003.030a kva nu te sūtaputro 'bhūt kva nu droṇaḥ sahānugaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:463: 09,003.030c ahaṃ kva ca kva cātmā te hārdikyaś ca tathā kva nu
GE07mbh_09_u:464: 09,003.030e duḥśāsanaś ca bhrātā te bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ kva nu
GE07mbh_09_u:466: 09,003.031c saṃbandhinas te bhrātṝṃś ca sahāyān mātulāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:467: 09,003.032a sarvān vikramya miṣato lokāṃś cākramya mūrdhani
GE07mbh_09_u:468: 09,003.032c jayadratho hato rājan kiṃ nu śeṣam upāsmahe
GE07mbh_09_u:469: 09,003.033a ko veha sa pumān asti yo vijeṣyati pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:470: 09,003.033b*0031_01 asti kaḥ puruṣaś cādya yo jeṣyati dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_09_u:472: 09,003.033e gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣo vīryāṇi harate hi naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:476: 09,003.034d*0032_02 yathā nadī śuṣkajalā senā karṇaṃ vinā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:479: 09,003.036a sātyakeś caiva yo vego bhīmasenasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:480: 09,003.036c dārayeta girīn sarvāñ śoṣayeta ca sāgarān
GE07mbh_09_u:481: 09,003.037a uvāca vākyaṃ yad bhīmaḥ sabhāmadhye viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:482: 09,003.037c kṛtaṃ tat sakalaṃ tena bhūyaś caiva kariṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:485: 09,003.039a yuṣmābhis tāni cīrṇāni yāny asādhūni sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:486: 09,003.039c akāraṇakṛtāny eva teṣāṃ vaḥ phalam āgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:487: 09,003.040a ātmano 'rthe tvayā loko yatnataḥ sarva āhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:488: 09,003.040c sa te saṃśayitas tāta ātmā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:490: 09,003.041c bhinne hi bhājane tāta diśo gacchati tadgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:491: 09,003.042a hīyamānena vai saṃdhiḥ paryeṣṭavyaḥ samena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:494: 09,003.043c atra te pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃdhiṃ manye kṣamaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:495: 09,003.044a na jānīte hi yaḥ śreyaḥ śreyasaś cāvamanyate
GE07mbh_09_u:496: 09,003.044c sa kṣipraṃ bhraśyate rājyān na ca śreyo 'nuvindati
GE07mbh_09_u:497: 09,003.045a praṇipatya hi rājānaṃ rājyaṃ yadi labhemahi
GE07mbh_09_u:498: 09,003.045c śreyaḥ syān na tu mauḍhyena rājan gantuṃ parābhavam
GE07mbh_09_u:503: 09,003.046d*0033_03 kurvanti bhrātaraś cāsya vacanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:504: 09,003.047a yad brūyād dhi hṛṣīkeśo rājānam aparājitam
GE07mbh_09_u:505: 09,003.047c arjunaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca sarvaṃ kuryur asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_09_u:508: 09,003.049a etat kṣamam ahaṃ manye tava pārthair avigraham
GE07mbh_09_u:509: 09,003.049c na tvā bravīmi kārpaṇyān na prāṇaparirakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:510: 09,003.049e pathyaṃ rājan bravīmi tvāṃ tat parāsuḥ smariṣyasi
GE07mbh_09_u:511: 09,003.050a iti vṛddho vilapyaitat kṛpaḥ śāradvato vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:512: 09,003.050c dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya śuśoca ca mumoha ca
GE07mbh_09_u:514: 09,004.001a evam uktas tato rājā gautamena yaśasvinā
GE07mbh_09_u:515: 09,004.001c niḥśvasya dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca tūṣṇīm āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:516: 09,004.002a tato muhūrtaṃ sa dhyātvā dhārtarāṣṭro mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:517: 09,004.002c kṛpaṃ śāradvataṃ vākyam ity uvāca paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:518: 09,004.003a yat kiṃ cit suhṛdā vācyaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrāvito hy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:519: 09,004.003c kṛtaṃ ca bhavatā sarvaṃ prāṇān saṃtyajya yudhyatā
GE07mbh_09_u:522: 09,004.005a suhṛdā yad idaṃ vācyaṃ bhavatā śrāvito hy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:523: 09,004.005c na māṃ prīṇāti tat sarvaṃ mumūrṣor iva bheṣajam
GE07mbh_09_u:525: 09,004.006c ucyamānaṃ mahābāho na me viprāgrya rocate
GE07mbh_09_u:528: 09,004.007e sa kathaṃ mama vākyāni śraddadhyād bhūya eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:529: 09,004.008a tathā dautyena saṃprāptaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pārthahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:530: 09,004.008c pralabdhaś ca hṛṣīkeśas tac ca karma virodhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:531: 09,004.008e sa ca me vacanaṃ brahman katham evābhimaṃsyate
GE07mbh_09_u:532: 09,004.009a vilalāpa hi yat kṛṣṇā sabhāmadhye sameyuṣī
GE07mbh_09_u:533: 09,004.009c na tan marṣayate kṛṣṇo na rājyaharaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:534: 09,004.010a ekaprāṇāv ubhau kṛṣṇāv anyonyaṃ prati saṃhatau
GE07mbh_09_u:535: 09,004.010c purā yac chrutam evāsīd adya paśyāmi tat prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:536: 09,004.011a svasrīyaṃ ca hataṃ śrutvā duḥkhaṃ svapiti keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:537: 09,004.011c kṛtāgaso vayaṃ tasya sa madarthaṃ kathaṃ kṣamet
GE07mbh_09_u:539: 09,004.012c sa kathaṃ maddhite yatnaṃ prakariṣyati yācitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:541: 09,004.013c pratijñātaṃ ca tenograṃ sa bhajyeta na saṃnamet
GE07mbh_09_u:542: 09,004.013d*0034_01 sa haniṣyati māṃ rudrahastenāpi hi rakṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:544: 09,004.014c kṛtavairāv ubhau vīrau yamāv api yamopamau
GE07mbh_09_u:545: 09,004.015a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca kṛtavairau mayā saha
GE07mbh_09_u:546: 09,004.015c tau kathaṃ maddhite yatnaṃ prakuryātāṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_09_u:549: 09,004.017a tathā vivasanāṃ dīnāṃ smaranty adyāpi pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:550: 09,004.017b*0035_01 kṛṣṇaḥ pratyaham evedaṃ vakti nāśe mamoditaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:551: 09,004.017b*0035_02 teṣu jīvatsu pārtheṣu tasmiñ jīvati keśave
GE07mbh_09_u:553: 09,004.017c na nivārayituṃ śakyāḥ saṃgrāmāt te paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:554: 09,004.018a yadā ca draupadī kṛṣṇā madvināśāya duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_09_u:555: 09,004.018c ugraṃ tepe tapaḥ kṛṣṇā bhartṝṇām arthasiddhaye
GE07mbh_09_u:556: 09,004.018e sthaṇḍile nityadā śete yāvad vairasya yātanā
GE07mbh_09_u:558: 09,004.019c kṛṣṇāyāḥ preṣyavad bhūtvā śuśrūṣāṃ kurute sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:559: 09,004.020a iti sarvaṃ samunnaddhaṃ na nirvāti kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:560: 09,004.020c abhimanyor vināśena sa saṃdheyaḥ kathaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:561: 09,004.021a kathaṃ ca nāma bhuktvemāṃ pṛthivīṃ sāgarāmbarām
GE07mbh_09_u:563: 09,004.022a upary upari rājñāṃ vai jvalito bhāskaro yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:565: 09,004.023a kathaṃ bhuktvā svayaṃ bhogān dattvā dāyāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_09_u:567: 09,004.024a nābhyasūyāmi te vākyam uktaṃ snigdhaṃ hitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_09_u:568: 09,004.024c na tu saṃdhim ahaṃ manye prāptakālaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:570: 09,004.025c nāyaṃ klībayituṃ kālaḥ saṃyoddhuṃ kāla eva naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:571: 09,004.026a iṣṭaṃ me bahubhir yajñair dattā vipreṣu dakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:572: 09,004.026c prāptāḥ kramaśrutā vedāḥ śatrūṇāṃ mūrdhni ca sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:573: 09,004.027a bhṛtyā me subhṛtās tāta dīnaś cābhyuddhṛto janaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:576: 09,004.028a bhuktāś ca vividhā bhogās trivargaḥ sevito mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:578: 09,004.029a na dhruvaṃ sukham astīha kuto rājyaṃ kuto yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:579: 09,004.029c iha kīrtir vidhātavyā sā ca yuddhena nānyathā
GE07mbh_09_u:580: 09,004.030a gṛhe yat kṣatriyasyāpi nidhanaṃ tad vigarhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:581: 09,004.030c adharmaḥ sumahān eṣa yac chayyāmaraṇaṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_09_u:582: 09,004.031a araṇye yo vimuñceta saṃgrāme vā tanuṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:583: 09,004.031c kratūn āhṛtya mahato mahimānaṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_09_u:585: 09,004.032c mriyate rudatāṃ madhye jñātīnāṃ na sa pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:586: 09,004.033a tyaktvā tu vividhān bhogān prāptānāṃ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_09_u:591: 09,004.035c mudā nūnaṃ prapaśyanti śubhrā hy apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:592: 09,004.035d*0037_01 mṛdhe tanutyajo yodhān prekṣanty apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:597: 09,004.037c api taiḥ saṃgataṃ mārgaṃ vayam apy āruhemahi
GE07mbh_09_u:605: 09,004.041a tais tv ayaṃ racitaḥ panthā durgamo hi punar bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:606: 09,004.041c saṃpatadbhir mahāvegair ito yādbhiś ca sadgatim
GE07mbh_09_u:607: 09,004.042a ye madarthe hatāḥ śūrās teṣāṃ kṛtam anusmaran
GE07mbh_09_u:608: 09,004.042c ṛṇaṃ tat pratimuñcāno na rājye mana ādadhe
GE07mbh_09_u:609: 09,004.043a pātayitvā vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn atha pitāmahān
GE07mbh_09_u:610: 09,004.043c jīvitaṃ yadi rakṣeyaṃ loko māṃ garhayed dhruvam
GE07mbh_09_u:611: 09,004.044a kīdṛśaṃ ca bhaved rājyaṃ mama hīnasya bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:612: 09,004.044c sakhibhiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca praṇipatya ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:614: 09,004.045c suyuddhena tataḥ svargaṃ prāpsyāmi na tad anyathā
GE07mbh_09_u:615: 09,004.046a evaṃ duryodhanenoktaṃ sarve saṃpūjya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:616: 09,004.046b*0040_01 tac chrutvā tava putrasya sattvayuktasya bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:617: 09,004.046c sādhu sādhv iti rājānaṃ kṣatriyāḥ saṃbabhāṣire
GE07mbh_09_u:622: 09,004.049a ākāśe vidrume puṇye prasthe himavataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_09_u:623: 09,004.049c aruṇāṃ sarasvatīṃ prāpya papuḥ sasnuś ca tajjalam
GE07mbh_09_u:624: 09,004.050a tava putrāḥ kṛtotsāhāḥ paryavartanta te tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:629: 09,005.001c sarva eva mahārāja yodhās tatra samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:630: 09,005.002a śalyaś ca citrasenaś ca śakuniś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:631: 09,005.002c aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:633: 09,005.003c jayatsenaś ca rājānas te rātrim uṣitās tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:634: 09,005.004a raṇe karṇe hate vīre trāsitā jitakāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:635: 09,005.004c nālabhañ śarma te putrā himavantam ṛte girim
GE07mbh_09_u:637: 09,005.005c kṛtayatnā raṇe rājan saṃpūjya vidhivat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:638: 09,005.006a kṛtvā senāpraṇetāraṃ parāṃs tvaṃ yoddhum arhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:647: 09,005.010c ādityasya tviṣā tulyaṃ buddhyā cośanasā samam
GE07mbh_09_u:651: 09,005.012c smṛtvā smṛtvaiva ca guṇān dhātrā yatnād vinirmitam
GE07mbh_09_u:655: 09,005.013d*0041_02 prayogaviniyogau ca smṛtiṃ yasya guṇān viduḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:656: 09,005.014a daśāṅgaṃ yaś catuṣpādam iṣvastraṃ veda tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:657: 09,005.014c sāṅgāṃś ca caturo vedān samyag ākhyānapañcamān
GE07mbh_09_u:658: 09,005.015a ārādhya tryambakaṃ yatnād vratair ugrair mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:663: 09,005.017a yaṃ puraskṛtya sahitā yudhi jeṣyāma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:665: 09,005.017e bhavāṃs tasmān niyogāt te ko 'stu senāpatir mama
GE07mbh_09_u:667: 09,005.018a ayaṃ kulena vīryeṇa tejasā yaśasā śriyā
GE07mbh_09_u:668: 09,005.018c sarvair guṇaiḥ samuditaḥ śalyo no 'stu camūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:672: 09,005.020c śakyaḥ prāptuṃ jayo 'smābhir devaiḥ skandam ivājitam
GE07mbh_09_u:674: 09,005.021c parivārya sthitāḥ śalyaṃ jayaśabdāṃś ca cakrire
GE07mbh_09_u:675: 09,005.021e yuddhāya ca matiṃ cakrūr āveśaṃ ca paraṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:676: 09,005.022a tato duryodhanaḥ śalyaṃ bhūmau sthitvā rathe sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:678: 09,005.023a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto mitrāṇāṃ mitravatsala
GE07mbh_09_u:679: 09,005.023c yatra mitram amitraṃ vā parīkṣante budhā janāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:680: 09,005.024a sa bhavān astu naḥ śūraḥ praṇetā vāhinīmukhe
GE07mbh_09_u:681: 09,005.024c raṇaṃ ca yāte bhavati pāṇḍavā mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:686: 09,005.025a yat tu māṃ manyase rājan kururāja karomi tat
GE07mbh_09_u:687: 09,005.025c tvatpriyārthaṃ hi me sarvaṃ prāṇā rājyaṃ dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:690: 09,005.026c so 'smān pāhi yudhāṃ śreṣṭha skando devān ivāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:692: 09,005.027c jahi śatrūn raṇe vīra mahendro dānavān iva
GE07mbh_09_u:694: 09,006.001a etac chrutvā vaco rājño madrarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:695: 09,006.001c duryodhanaṃ tadā rājan vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:697: 09,006.002c yāv etau manyase kṛṣṇau rathasthau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_09_u:698: 09,006.002e na me tulyāv ubhāv etau bāhuvīrye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:700: 09,006.003c yodhayeyaṃ raṇamukhe saṃkruddhaḥ kim u pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:701: 09,006.003e vijeṣye ca raṇe pārthān somakāṃś ca samāgatān
GE07mbh_09_u:702: 09,006.004a ahaṃ senāpraṇetā te bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:703: 09,006.004c taṃ ca vyūhaṃ vidhāsyāmi na tariṣyanti yaṃ pare
GE07mbh_09_u:704: 09,006.004e iti satyaṃ bravīmy eṣa duryodhana na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:705: 09,006.005a evam uktas tato rājā madrādhipatim añjasā
GE07mbh_09_u:708: 09,006.006a abhiṣikte tatas tasmin siṃhanādo mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_09_u:709: 09,006.006c tava sainyeṣv avādyanta vāditrāṇi ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:710: 09,006.007a hṛṣṭāś cāsaṃs tadā yodhā madrakāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:712: 09,006.008a jaya rājaṃś ciraṃ jīva jahi śatrūn samāgatān
GE07mbh_09_u:715: 09,006.009a tvaṃ hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ sasurāsuramānavān
GE07mbh_09_u:716: 09,006.009c martyadharmāṇa iha tu kim u somakasṛñjayān
GE07mbh_09_u:717: 09,006.010a evaṃ saṃstūyamānas tu madrāṇām adhipo balī
GE07mbh_09_u:718: 09,006.010c harṣaṃ prāpa tadā vīro durāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:720: 09,006.011a adyaivāhaṃ raṇe sarvān pāñcālān saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:721: 09,006.011c nihaniṣyāmi rājendra svargaṃ yāsyāmi vā hataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:722: 09,006.012a adya paśyantu māṃ lokā vicarantam abhītavat
GE07mbh_09_u:724: 09,006.013a pāñcālāś cedayaś caiva draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:725: 09,006.013c dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca sarve cāpi prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:726: 09,006.014a vikramaṃ mama paśyantu dhanuṣaś ca mahad balam
GE07mbh_09_u:727: 09,006.014c lāghavaṃ cāstravīryaṃ ca bhujayoś ca balaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:728: 09,006.015a adya paśyantu me pārthāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:729: 09,006.015c yādṛśaṃ me balaṃ bāhvoḥ saṃpad astreṣu yā ca me
GE07mbh_09_u:730: 09,006.016a adya me vikramaṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:733: 09,006.017c droṇabhīṣmāv ati vibho sūtaputraṃ ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:734: 09,006.017e vicariṣye raṇe yudhyan priyārthaṃ tava kaurava
GE07mbh_09_u:736: 09,006.018a abhiṣikte tadā śalye tava sainyeṣu mānada
GE07mbh_09_u:737: 09,006.018c na karṇavyasanaṃ kiṃ cin menire tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:738: 09,006.019a hṛṣṭāḥ sumanasaś caiva babhūvus tatra sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:740: 09,006.020a praharṣaṃ prāpya senā tu tāvakī bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:741: 09,006.020c tāṃ rātriṃ sukhinī suptā svasthacitteva sābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:742: 09,006.021a sainyasya tava taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:746: 09,006.023a etac chrutvā yathābhūtaṃ kuru mādhava yat kṣamam
GE07mbh_09_u:747: 09,006.023c bhavān netā ca goptā ca vidhatsva yad anantaram
GE07mbh_09_u:750: 09,006.025a vīryavāṃś ca mahātejā mahātmā ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:751: 09,006.025c kṛtī ca citrayodhī ca saṃyukto lāghavena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:752: 09,006.026a yādṛg bhīṣmas tathā droṇo yādṛk karṇaś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:753: 09,006.026c tādṛśas tad viśiṣṭo vā madrarājo mato mama
GE07mbh_09_u:754: 09,006.026d*0043_01 evam ukte tu kṛṣṇena dharmarājo viśāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:757: 09,006.026d*0043_04 ninādair ubhayos tatra sainyayor vyāptam ambaram
GE07mbh_09_u:763: 09,006.029c vicariṣyaty abhīḥ kāle kālaḥ kruddhaḥ prajāsv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:766: 09,006.031a sadevaloke kṛtsne 'smin nānyas tvattaḥ pumān bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:767: 09,006.031c madrarājaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ yo hanyāt kurunandana
GE07mbh_09_u:768: 09,006.031e ahany ahani yudhyantaṃ kṣobhayantaṃ balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:769: 09,006.032a tasmāj jahi raṇe śalyaṃ maghavān iva śambaram
GE07mbh_09_u:771: 09,006.033a tavaiva hi jayo nūnaṃ hate madreśvare yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:772: 09,006.033c tasmin hate hataṃ sarvaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrabalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:773: 09,006.034a etac chrutvā mahārāja vacanaṃ mama sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_09_u:775: 09,006.034e jahi cainaṃ mahābāho vāsavo namuciṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:776: 09,006.035a na caivātra dayā kāryā mātulo 'yaṃ mameti vai
GE07mbh_09_u:779: 09,006.036c mā nimajjasva sagaṇaḥ śalyam āsādya goṣpadam
GE07mbh_09_u:780: 09,006.037a yac ca te tapaso vīryaṃ yac ca kṣātraṃ balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:781: 09,006.037b*0044_01 cakṣur dharmeti yal loke kathyase tvaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:782: 09,006.037c tad darśaya raṇe sarvaṃ jahi cainaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:785: 09,006.039a keśave tu tadā yāte dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:786: 09,006.039c visṛjya sarvān bhrātṝṃś ca pāñcālān atha somakān
GE07mbh_09_u:787: 09,006.039e suṣvāpa rajanīṃ tāṃ tu viśalya iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:788: 09,006.040a te ca sarve maheṣvāsāḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:789: 09,006.040b*0045_01 abravīt tāvakān sarvān karṇasya nidhanena vai
GE07mbh_09_u:790: 09,006.040c karṇasya nidhane hṛṣṭāḥ suṣupus tāṃ niśāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:793: 09,006.041e sūtaputrasya nidhane jayaṃ labdhvā ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:796: 09,007.001a vyatītāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:798: 09,007.002a rājñas tu matam ājñāya samanahyata sā camūḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:802: 09,007.004a vāditrāṇāṃ ca ninadaḥ prādurāsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:803: 09,007.004c bodhanārthaṃ hi yodhānāṃ sainyānāṃ cāpy udīryatām
GE07mbh_09_u:805: 09,007.005c saṃnaddhāny eva dadṛśur mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
GE07mbh_09_u:808: 09,007.007a tataḥ sarve samāgamya putreṇa tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:809: 09,007.007c kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca drauṇiḥ śalyo 'tha saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:810: 09,007.008a anye ca pārthivāḥ śeṣāḥ samayaṃ cakrire tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:811: 09,007.008c na na ekena yoddhavyaṃ kathaṃ cid api pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:812: 09,007.009a yo hy ekaḥ pāṇḍavair yudhyed yo vā yudhyantam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_09_u:813: 09,007.009c sa pañcabhir bhaved yuktaḥ pātakaiḥ sopapātakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:815: 09,007.009e anyonyaṃ parirakṣadbhir yoddhavyaṃ sahitaiś ca naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:816: 09,007.010a evaṃ te samayaṃ kṛtvā sarve tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:818: 09,007.011a tathaiva pāṇḍavā rājan vyūhya sainyaṃ mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:823: 09,007.013a droṇasya bhīṣmasya ca vai rādheyasya ca me śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:824: 09,007.013c pātanaṃ śaṃsa me bhūyaḥ śalyasyātha sutasya me
GE07mbh_09_u:825: 09,007.014a kathaṃ raṇe hataḥ śalyo dharmarājena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:827: 09,007.014c bhīmena ca mahābāhuḥ putro duryodhano mama
GE07mbh_09_u:830: 09,007.015c śṛṇu rājan sthiro bhūtvā saṃgrāmaṃ śaṃsato mama
GE07mbh_09_u:833: 09,007.016a āśā balavatī rājan putrāṇāṃ te 'bhavat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:834: 09,007.016c hate bhīṣme ca droṇe ca sūtaputre ca pātite
GE07mbh_09_u:835: 09,007.016e śalyaḥ pārthān raṇe sarvān nihaniṣyati māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:836: 09,007.017a tām āśāṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā samāśvāsya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:839: 09,007.018a yadā karṇe hate pārthāḥ siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire
GE07mbh_09_u:840: 09,007.018c tadā rājan dhārtarāṣṭrān āviveśa mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_09_u:841: 09,007.019a tān samāśvāsya tu tadā madrarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:847: 09,007.021d*0050_01 tasya sthitvā mahārāja mukhe vyūhasya daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:849: 09,007.022c tasthau śūro mahārāja putrāṇāṃ te bhayapraṇut
GE07mbh_09_u:851: 09,007.023c madrakaiḥ sahito vīraiḥ karṇaputraiś ca durjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:853: 09,007.024c gautamo dakṣiṇe pārśve śakaiś ca yavanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:858: 09,007.027a pāṇḍavāś ca maheṣvāsā vyūhya sainyam ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:859: 09,007.027c tridhā bhūtvā mahārāja tava sainyam upādravan
GE07mbh_09_u:860: 09,007.028a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:866: 09,007.031a gautamaṃ bhīmaseno vai somakāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:868: 09,007.032a mādrīputrau tu śakunim ulūkaṃ ca mahārathau
GE07mbh_09_u:873: 09,007.034a hate bhīṣme maheṣvāse droṇe karṇe mahārathe
GE07mbh_09_u:876: 09,007.035c māmakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca kiṃ śiṣṭam abhavad balam
GE07mbh_09_u:878: 09,007.036a yathā vayaṃ pare rājan yuddhāya samavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:879: 09,007.036c yāvac cāsīd balaṃ śiṣṭaṃ saṃgrāme tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_09_u:881: 09,007.037c daśa dantisahasrāṇi sapta caiva śatāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:883: 09,007.038c narakoṭyas tathā tisro balam etat tavābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:886: 09,007.040a etad balaṃ pāṇḍavānām abhavac cheṣam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:887: 09,007.040b*0051_01 svalpam apy etad eveha balavat parirakṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:890: 09,007.040d*0052_02 bhrāntyāśvāḥ śataśas tatra netrāṇy uccair avarṣayan
GE07mbh_09_u:896: 09,007.043c upayātā naravyāghrāḥ pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ prati prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:902: 09,008.002a narā rathā gajaughāś ca sādinaś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:906: 09,008.004a nāgair abhyāhatāḥ ke cit sarathā rathino 'patan
GE07mbh_09_u:908: 09,008.005a hayaughān pādarakṣāṃś ca rathinas tatra śikṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:912: 09,008.007a dhanvinaḥ puruṣāḥ ke cit saṃnivārya mahārathān
GE07mbh_09_u:916: 09,008.009a tathā ca rathinaṃ kruddhaṃ vikirantaṃ śarān bahūn
GE07mbh_09_u:918: 09,008.010a nāgo nāgam abhidrutya rathī ca rathinaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:923: 09,008.012c haṃsā himavataḥ prasthe pibanta iva medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:924: 09,008.013a teṣāṃ tu vājināṃ bhūmiḥ khuraiś citrā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:927: 09,008.014c pattīnāṃ cāpi śabdena nāgānāṃ bṛṃhitena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:928: 09,008.015a vāditrāṇāṃ ca ghoṣeṇa śaṅkhānāṃ nisvanena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:929: 09,008.015c abhavan nāditā bhūmir nirghātair iva bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:931: 09,008.016c kavacānāṃ prabhābhiś ca na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:935: 09,008.018c cyutānām iva tālebhyaḥ phalānāṃ śrūyate svanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:941: 09,008.021c patitair bhāti rājendra mahī śakradhvajair iva
GE07mbh_09_u:945: 09,008.023c senāvanaṃ tac chuśubhe vanaṃ puṣpācitaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:946: 09,008.024a tatra yodhā mahārāja vicaranto hy abhītavat

GE07mbh_09_u:1831: 09,015.059c itīva niścayo nābhūd yodhānāṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1835: 09,015.062a so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya śalyaṃ śaraśatais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1838: 09,015.063c dvābhyām atha śitāgrābhyām ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_09_u:1841: 09,015.064e tataḥ prabhagnaṃ tat sainyaṃ dauryodhanam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_09_u:1844: 09,015.066a muhūrtam iva tau gatvā nardamāne yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_09_u:1845: 09,015.066c sthitvā tato madrapatir anyaṃ syandanam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1852: 09,016.002a tataḥ sa śaravarṣeṇa parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
GE07mbh_09_u:1854: 09,016.003a sātyakiṃ daśabhir viddhvā bhīmasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1856: 09,016.004a tāṃs tān anyān maheṣvāsān sāśvān sarathakuñjarān
GE07mbh_09_u:1857: 09,016.004b*0089_01 ardayām āsa viśikhair ulkābhir iva kuñjarān
GE07mbh_09_u:1859: 09,016.004e rathāṃś ca rathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ jaghāna rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1860: 09,016.005a bāhūṃś ciccheda ca tathā sāyudhān ketanāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1861: 09,016.005c cakāra ca mahīṃ yodhais tīrṇāṃ vedīṃ kuśair iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1862: 09,016.006a tathā tam arisainyāni ghnantaṃ mṛtyum ivāntakam
GE07mbh_09_u:1864: 09,016.007a taṃ bhīmasenaś ca śineś ca naptā;
GE07mbh_09_u:1916: 09,016.019c bhittvā hy uras tapanīyaṃ ca varma;
GE07mbh_09_u:1938: 09,016.024d*0091_01 yad adbhutaṃ karma na śakyam anyaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2060: 09,016.051a prasārya bāhū sa rathād gato gāṃ;
GE07mbh_09_u:2069: 09,016.053c pratyudgata iva premṇā bhūmyā sa narapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2071: 09,016.054c ciraṃ bhuktvā vasumatīṃ priyāṃ kāntām iva prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2072: 09,016.054e sarvair aṅgaiḥ samāśliṣya prasupta iva so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:2074: 09,016.055c samyag ghuta iva sviṣṭaḥ praśānto 'gnir ivādhvare
GE07mbh_09_u:2076: 09,016.056c saṃśāntam api madreśaṃ lakṣmīr naiva vyamuñcata
GE07mbh_09_u:2078: 09,016.057c vyadhamad dviṣataḥ saṃkhye khagarāḍ iva pannagān
GE07mbh_09_u:2079: 09,016.057e dehāsūn niśitair bhallai ripūṇāṃ nāśayan kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:2080: 09,016.058a tataḥ pārthasya bāṇaughair āvṛtāḥ sainikās tava
GE07mbh_09_u:2084: 09,016.059c bhrātuḥ sarvair guṇais tulyo rathī pāṇḍavam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:2085: 09,016.060a vivyādha ca naraśreṣṭho nārācair bahubhis tvaran
GE07mbh_09_u:2087: 09,016.061a taṃ vivyādhāśugaiḥ ṣaḍbhir dharmarājas tvarann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:2088: 09,016.061c kārmukaṃ cāsya ciccheda kṣurābhyāṃ dhvajam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:2092: 09,016.063a sakuṇḍalaṃ tad dadṛśe patamānaṃ śiro rathāt
GE07mbh_09_u:2100: 09,016.067a tāṃs tathā bhajyatas trastān kauravān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:2101: 09,016.067b*0096_01 tat sainyaṃ tava putrasya vidrutaṃ sarvato bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:2102: 09,016.067c śiner naptā kiran bāṇair abhyavartata sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2106: 09,016.069c hārdikyaḥ sātyakiś caiva siṃhāv iva madotkaṭau
GE07mbh_09_u:2111: 09,016.072a sātyakiṃ daśabhir viddhvā hayāṃś cāsya tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2113: 09,016.073a tan nikṛttaṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭham apāsya śinipuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2115: 09,016.074a tad ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaḥ sarvadhanvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:2117: 09,016.075a tato rathaṃ yugeṣāṃ ca chittvā bhallaiḥ susaṃyataiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2118: 09,016.075c aśvāṃs tasyāvadhīt tūrṇam ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_09_u:2119: 09,016.075d*0097_01 hārdikyaṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:2120: 09,016.075d*0097_02 apovāha tataḥ kṣipraṃ ratham āropya vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:2124: 09,016.077c balaṃ tu hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ tat tadāsīt parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_09_u:2125: 09,016.078a tato muhūrtāt te 'paśyan rajo bhaumaṃ samutthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:2127: 09,016.078d*0098_01 vividhān saritaś coghāñ śoṇitasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:2128: 09,016.079a tato duryodhano dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ svabalam antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:2130: 09,016.080a pāṇḍavān sarathān dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:2131: 09,016.080c ānartaṃ ca durādharṣaṃ śitair bāṇair avākirat
GE07mbh_09_u:2132: 09,016.081a taṃ pare nābhyavartanta martyā mṛtyum ivāgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:2134: 09,016.081d*0099_01 pragṛhya ca dhanur ghoram abhyadhāvad yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_09_u:2137: 09,016.082e vivyādha gautamaṃ cāpi ṣaḍbhir bhallaiḥ sutejanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2154: 09,017.001c rathāḥ saptaśatā vīrā niryayur mahato balāt
GE07mbh_09_u:2157: 09,017.002e na gantavyaṃ na gantavyam iti madrān avārayat
GE07mbh_09_u:2158: 09,017.003a duryodhanena te vīrā vāryamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2160: 09,017.004a te tu śūrā mahārāja kṛtacittāḥ sma yodhane
GE07mbh_09_u:2162: 09,017.005a śrutvā tu nihataṃ śalyaṃ dharmaputraṃ ca pīḍitam
GE07mbh_09_u:2164: 09,017.006a ājagāma tataḥ pārtho gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2166: 09,017.007a tato 'rjunaś ca bhīmaś ca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:2167: 09,017.007c sātyakiś ca naravyāghro draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2168: 09,017.008a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca pāñcālāḥ saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2171: 09,017.009c kṣobhayanti sma tāṃ senāṃ makarāḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:2173: 09,017.010c akṣobhyata tadā rājan pāṇḍūnāṃ dhvajinī punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2175: 09,017.011c vṛkṣān iva mahāvātāḥ kampayanti sma tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2176: 09,017.012a bahavaś cukruśus tatra kva sa rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2177: 09,017.012c bhrātaro vāsya te śūrā dṛśyante neha ke cana
GE07mbh_09_u:2180: 09,017.014a evaṃ tān vādinaḥ śūrān draupadeyā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2182: 09,017.015a cakrair vimathitaiḥ ke cit ke cic chinnair mahādhvajaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2184: 09,017.016a ālokya pāṇḍavān yuddhe yodhā rājan samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2185: 09,017.016c vāryamāṇā yayur vegāt tava putreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:2186: 09,017.017a duryodhanas tu tān vīrān vārayām āsa sāntvayan
GE07mbh_09_u:2187: 09,017.017c na cāsya śāsanaṃ kaś cit tatra cakre mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2190: 09,017.019a kiṃ naḥ saṃprekṣamāṇānāṃ madrāṇāṃ hanyate balam
GE07mbh_09_u:2191: 09,017.019c na yuktam etat samare tvayi tiṣṭhati bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:2192: 09,017.020a sahitair nāma yoddhavyam ity eṣa samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2193: 09,017.020c atha kasmāt parān eva ghnato marṣayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:2195: 09,017.021a vāryamāṇā mayā pūrvaṃ naite cakrur vaco mama
GE07mbh_09_u:2196: 09,017.021c ete hi nihatāḥ sarve praskannāḥ pāṇḍuvāhinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:2199: mayā pūrvaṃ na kṛtaṃ vacanaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_09_u:2200: 09,017.022a na bhartuḥ śāsanaṃ vīrā raṇe kurvanty amarṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2201: 09,017.022c alaṃ kroddhuṃ tathaiteṣāṃ nāyaṃ kāla upekṣitum
GE07mbh_09_u:2207: 09,017.025a evam uktas tato rājā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2210: 09,017.026c ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdas tava sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:2214: 09,017.028a te muhūrtād raṇe vīrā hastāhastaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:2220: 09,017.031a rathair bhagnair yugākṣaiś ca nihataiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2224: 09,017.033a bhagnacakrān rathān ke cid avahaṃs turagā raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:2225: 09,017.033c rathārdhaṃ ke cid ādāya diśo daśa vibabhramuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2226: 09,017.033e tatra tatra ca dṛśyante yoktraiḥ śliṣṭāḥ sma vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2228: 09,017.034c gaganāt pracyutāḥ siddhāḥ puṇyānām iva saṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:2230: 09,017.035c asmān āpatataś cāpi dṛṣṭvā pārthā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2233: 09,017.037a asmāṃs tu punar āsādya labdhalakṣāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2236: 09,017.038c madrarājaṃ ca samare dṛṣṭvā śūraṃ nipātitam
GE07mbh_09_u:2242: 09,018.001c tāvakās tava putrāś ca prāyaśo vimukhābhavan
GE07mbh_09_u:2244: 09,018.002c apāre pāram icchanto hate śūre mahātmani
GE07mbh_09_u:2246: 09,018.003c anāthā nātham icchanto mṛgāḥ siṃhārditā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:2247: 09,018.004a vṛṣā yathā bhagnaśṛṅgāḥ śīrṇadantā gajā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:2249: 09,018.005a na saṃdhātum anīkāni na ca rājan parākrame
GE07mbh_09_u:2250: 09,018.005c āsīd buddhir hate śalye tava yodhasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_09_u:2251: 09,018.006a bhīṣme droṇe ca nihate sūtaputre ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:2252: 09,018.006c yad duḥkhaṃ tava yodhānāṃ bhayaṃ cāsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:2253: 09,018.006e tad bhayaṃ sa ca naḥ śoko bhūya evābhyavartata
GE07mbh_09_u:2254: 09,018.007a nirāśāś ca jaye tasmin hate śalye mahārathe
GE07mbh_09_u:2255: 09,018.007b*0102_01 nirāśaś ca hate śalye rājā rājan mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2256: 09,018.007c hatapravīrā vidhvastā vikṛttāś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2257: 09,018.007e madrarāje hate rājan yodhās te prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:2258: 09,018.008a aśvān anye gajān anye rathān anye mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2262: 09,018.010a te raṇād bharataśreṣṭha tāvakāḥ prādravan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2264: 09,018.011a tān prabhagnān drutān dṛṣṭvā hatotsāhān parājitān
GE07mbh_09_u:2268: 09,018.013a dṛṣṭvā tu kauravaṃ sainyaṃ bhayatrastaṃ pravidrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:2273: 09,018.014d*0103_02 draupadyā yaś ca saṃkalpaḥ saṃsiddha iti ghuṣyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:2274: 09,018.015a adya śrutvā hataṃ putraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2278: 09,018.016e adya kṣattur vacaḥ satyaṃ smaratāṃ bruvato hitam
GE07mbh_09_u:2280: 09,018.017b*0104_01 adyaiva ca hi pārthānāṃ yat kṛtaṃ pūrvakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2281: 09,018.017c vijānātu nṛpo duḥkhaṃ yat prāptaṃ pāṇḍunandanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2282: 09,018.018a adya kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ jānātu sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2284: 09,018.018d*0105_01 putrāṇāṃ ca vadhaṃ ghoraṃ bhīmena śroṣyate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2285: 09,018.019a astrāṇāṃ ca balaṃ sarvaṃ bāhvoś ca balam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:2286: 09,018.019c adya jñāsyati bhīmasya balaṃ ghoraṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2289: 09,018.020e nānyaḥ kartāsti loke tad ṛte bhīmaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:2291: 09,018.021c madrarājaṃ hataṃ śrutvā devair api suduḥsaham
GE07mbh_09_u:2293: 09,018.022c nihate saubale śūre gāndhāreṣu ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2294: 09,018.023a kathaṃ teṣāṃ jayo na syād yeṣāṃ yoddhā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2295: 09,018.023c sātyakir bhīmasenaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2296: 09,018.024a draupadyās tanayāḥ pañca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:2297: 09,018.024c śikhaṇḍī ca maheṣvāso rājā caiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2298: 09,018.025a yeṣāṃ ca jagatāṃ nātho nāthaḥ kṛṣṇo janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2299: 09,018.025c kathaṃ teṣāṃ jayo na syād yeṣāṃ dharmo vyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2300: 09,018.025d*0106_01 lābhas teṣāṃ jayas teṣāṃ kutas teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2302: 09,018.026a bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ ca karṇaṃ ca madrarājānam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:2304: 09,018.027a ko 'nyaḥ śakto raṇe jetum ṛte pārthaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_09_u:2306: 09,018.028a ity evaṃ vadamānās te harṣeṇa mahatā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2309: 09,018.029c mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2311: 09,018.030c duryodhanas tadā sūtam abravīd utsmayann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:2314: 09,018.032a jaghane yudhyamānaṃ hi kaunteyo māṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2316: 09,018.033a paśya sainyaṃ mahat sūta pāṇḍavaiḥ samabhidrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:2318: 09,018.034a siṃhanādāṃś ca bahuśaḥ śṛṇu ghorān bhayānakān
GE07mbh_09_u:2319: 09,018.034c tasmād yāhi śanaiḥ sūta jaghanaṃ paripālaya
GE07mbh_09_u:2320: 09,018.035a mayi sthite ca samare niruddheṣu ca pāṇḍuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:2322: 09,018.036a tac chrutvā tava putrasya śūrāgryasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2327: 09,018.038c avasthitās tadā yodhāḥ prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2330: 09,018.040a bhīmasenaṃ tadā rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:2335: 09,018.042c dhārtarāṣṭrā vinedur hi nānyāṃ cākathayan kathām
GE07mbh_09_u:2337: 09,018.042e parivārya raṇe bhīmaṃ nijaghnus te samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2339: 09,018.043c na cacāla rathopasthe maināka iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2340: 09,018.044a te tu kruddhā mahārāja pāṇḍavasya mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:2341: 09,018.044c nigrahītuṃ pracakrur hi yodhāṃś cānyān avārayan
GE07mbh_09_u:2342: 09,018.045a akrudhyata raṇe bhīmas tais tadā paryavasthitaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2346: 09,018.047a rathāśvadvipahīnāṃs tu tān bhīmo gadayā balī
GE07mbh_09_u:2360: 09,018.053a te sarve tāvakān dṛṣṭvā maheṣvāsān parāṅmukhān
GE07mbh_09_u:2363: 09,018.054a tad adbhutam apaśyāma tava putrasya pauruṣam
GE07mbh_09_u:2364: 09,018.054c yad ekaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā na śekur ativartitum
GE07mbh_09_u:2367: 09,018.056a na taṃ deśaṃ prapaśyāmi pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu vā
GE07mbh_09_u:2368: 09,018.056c yatra yātān na vo hanyuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2369: 09,018.057a alpaṃ ca balam eteṣāṃ kṛṣṇau ca bhṛśavikṣatau
GE07mbh_09_u:2370: 09,018.057c yadi sarve 'tra tiṣṭhāmo dhruvo no vijayo bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:2371: 09,018.058a viprayātāṃs tu vo bhinnān pāṇḍavāḥ kṛtakilbiṣān
GE07mbh_09_u:2372: 09,018.058c anusṛtya haniṣyanti śreyo naḥ samare sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:2373: 09,018.059a śṛṇudhvaṃ kṣatriyāḥ sarve yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2374: 09,018.059c yadā śūraṃ ca bhīruṃ ca mārayaty antakaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:2375: 09,018.059e ko nu mūḍho na yudhyeta puruṣaḥ kṣatriyabruvaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2376: 09,018.060a śreyo no bhīmasenasya kruddhasya pramukhe sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:2380: 09,018.060e jitveha sukham āpnoti hataḥ pretya mahat phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:2381: 09,018.061a na yuddhadharmāc chreyān vai panthāḥ svargasya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2382: 09,018.061c acireṇa jitāṃl lokān hato yuddhe samaśnute
GE07mbh_09_u:2383: 09,018.062a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya pūjayitvā ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2388: 09,018.064c viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2389: 09,018.065a mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2390: 09,018.065c javenābhyapatan hṛṣṭā yato vai tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_09_u:2436: 09,019.011a tatas tu taṃ vai dviradaṃ mahātmā;

GE07mbh_09_u:2595: 09,021.009c bhīmasenaṃ ca saptatyā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:2922: 09,023.017a anantakalpā dhvajinī bhūtvā hy eṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:2923: 09,023.017c kṣayam adya gatā yuddhe paśya daivaṃ yathāvidham
GE07mbh_09_u:2926: 09,023.019a hate bhīṣme ca saṃdadhyāc chivaṃ syād iha mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:2927: 09,023.019c na ca tat kṛtavān mūḍho dhārtarāṣṭraḥ subāliśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2928: 09,023.020a uktaṃ bhīṣmeṇa yad vākyaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:2929: 09,023.020c tac cāpi nāsau kṛtavān vītabuddhiḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2930: 09,023.021a tasmiṃs tu patite bhīṣme pracyute pṛthivītale
GE07mbh_09_u:2931: 09,023.021c na jāne kāraṇaṃ kiṃ nu yena yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_09_u:2932: 09,023.021d*0132_01 hate droṇe ca karṇe ca bhūriśravasi saṃgare
GE07mbh_09_u:2933: 09,023.021d*0132_02 duḥśāsane ca śālve ca śalye ca saparicchade
GE07mbh_09_u:2934: 09,023.021d*0132_03 bhagadatte ca vīrendre naivāśāmyata hā raṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2935: 09,023.021d*0132_04 yena bhīṣmas tathā droṇaḥ kṛpo vidura eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:2936: 09,023.021d*0132_05 pitā mātā śamasyārthe pratyākhyātās tu pāpinā
GE07mbh_09_u:2937: 09,023.022a mūḍhāṃs tu sarvathā manye dhārtarāṣṭrān subāliśān
GE07mbh_09_u:2938: 09,023.022c patite śaṃtanoḥ putre ye 'kārṣuḥ saṃyugaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2939: 09,023.023a anantaraṃ ca nihate droṇe brahmavidāṃ vare
GE07mbh_09_u:2940: 09,023.023c rādheye ca vikarṇe ca naivāśāmyata vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:2941: 09,023.023d*0133_01 rādheye sūtaputre ca naiva śāmyati vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:2944: 09,023.025a śrutāyuṣi hate śūre jalasaṃdhe ca paurave
GE07mbh_09_u:2946: 09,023.026a bhūriśravasi śalye ca śālve caiva janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:2948: 09,023.027a jayadrathe ca nihate rākṣase cāpy alāyudhe
GE07mbh_09_u:2950: 09,023.028a bhagadatte hate śūre kāmboje ca sudakṣiṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:2953: 09,023.029a dṛṣṭvā ca nihatāñ śūrān pṛthaṅ māṇḍalikān nṛpān
GE07mbh_09_u:2954: 09,023.029c balinaś ca raṇe kṛṣṇa naivāśāmyata vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:2956: 09,023.030c mohād vā yadi vā lobhān naivāśāmyata vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:2957: 09,023.030d*0135_01 hatapravīrāṃ vidhvastāṃ dṛṣṭvā cemāṃ camūṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:2958: 09,023.030d*0135_02 alambuse ca nihate naiva śāmyati vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:2959: 09,023.030d*0135_03 bhrātṝn vinihatān dṛṣṭvā vayasyān mātulān api
GE07mbh_09_u:2960: 09,023.030d*0135_04 putrān vinihatān saṃkhye naiva śāmyati vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:2961: 09,023.031a ko nu rājakule jātaḥ kauraveyo viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2962: 09,023.031c nirarthakaṃ mahad vairaṃ kuryād anyaḥ suyodhanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:2965: 09,023.032c amūḍhaḥ ko nu yudhyeta jānan prājño hitāhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:2966: 09,023.033a yan na tasya mano hy āsīt tvayoktasya hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2967: 09,023.033c praśame pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ so 'nyasya śṛṇuyāt katham
GE07mbh_09_u:2968: 09,023.034a yena śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo droṇo vidura eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:2969: 09,023.034c pratyākhyātāḥ śamasyārthe kiṃ nu tasyādya bheṣajam
GE07mbh_09_u:2970: 09,023.035a maurkhyād yena pitā vṛddhaḥ pratyākhyāto janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:2971: 09,023.035c tathā mātā hitaṃ vākyaṃ bhāṣamāṇā hitaiṣiṇī
GE07mbh_09_u:2972: 09,023.035e pratyākhyātā hy asatkṛtya sa kasmai rocayed vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2974: 09,023.036c tathāsya dṛśyate ceṣṭā nītiś caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:2975: 09,023.036e naiṣa dāsyati no rājyam iti me matir acyuta
GE07mbh_09_u:2977: 09,023.037c na jīvan dāsyate bhāgaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:2980: 09,023.039a na sa yukto 'nyathā jetum ṛte yuddhena mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:2981: 09,023.039c ity abravīt sadā māṃ hi viduraḥ satyadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2982: 09,023.040a tat sarvam adya jānāmi vyavasāyaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2983: 09,023.040c yad uktaṃ vacanaṃ tena vidureṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:2984: 09,023.041a yo hi śrutvā vacaḥ pathyaṃ jāmadagnyād yathātatham
GE07mbh_09_u:2986: 09,023.042a uktaṃ hi bahubhiḥ siddhair jātamātre suyodhane
GE07mbh_09_u:2987: 09,023.042c enaṃ prāpya durātmānaṃ kṣayaṃ kṣatraṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:2988: 09,023.043a tad idaṃ vacanaṃ teṣāṃ niruktaṃ vai janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:2989: 09,023.043c kṣayaṃ yātā hi rājāno duryodhanakṛte bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:2990: 09,023.044a so 'dya sarvān raṇe yodhān nihaniṣyāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:2991: 09,023.044c kṣatriyeṣu hateṣv āśu śūnye ca śibire kṛte
GE07mbh_09_u:2993: 09,023.045c tad antaṃ hi bhaved vairam anumānena mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:2994: 09,023.046a evaṃ paśyāmi vārṣṇeya cintayan prajñayā svayā
GE07mbh_09_u:2995: 09,023.046c vidurasya ca vākyena ceṣṭayā ca durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:2996: 09,023.047a saṃyāhi bhāratīṃ vīra yāvad dhanmi śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3002: 09,023.049c tad balaugham amitrāṇām abhītaḥ prāviśad raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:3007: 09,023.052a te hayāḥ pāṇḍurā rājan vahanto 'rjunam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:3015: 09,023.056a narān nāgān samāhatya hayāṃś cāpi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:3016: 09,023.056c apatanta raṇe bāṇāḥ pataṃgā iva ghoṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3018: 09,023.057c na prājñāyanta samare diśo vā pradiśo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_09_u:3019: 09,023.058a sarvam āsīj jagat pūrṇaṃ pārthanāmāṅkitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3024: 09,023.060c dadāha samare yodhān kakṣam agnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_09_u:3046: 09,024.002c visṛjan dṛśyate bāṇān dhārā muñcann ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3049: 09,024.003d*0138_01 pitṝn bhrātṝn parityajya vayasyān api cāpare
GE07mbh_09_u:3050: 09,024.004a hatadhuryā rathāḥ ke cid dhatasūtās tathāpare
GE07mbh_09_u:3051: 09,024.004c bhagnākṣayugacakreṣāḥ ke cid āsan viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:3053: 09,024.005c akṣatā yugapat ke cit prādravan bhayapīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3055: 09,024.006c vicukruśuḥ pitṝn anye sahāyān apare punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3056: 09,024.007a bāndhavāṃś ca naravyāghra bhrātṝn saṃbandhinas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:3057: 09,024.007c dudruvuḥ ke cid utsṛjya tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:3060: 09,024.009a tān anye ratham āropya samāśvāsya muhūrtakam
GE07mbh_09_u:3061: 09,024.009c viśrāntāś ca vitṛṣṇāś ca punar yuddhāya jagmire
GE07mbh_09_u:3062: 09,024.010a tān apāsya gatāḥ ke cit punar eva yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3064: 09,024.011a pānīyam apare pītvā paryāśvāsya ca vāhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:3065: 09,024.011c varmāṇi ca samāropya ke cid bharatasattama
GE07mbh_09_u:3067: 09,024.012c putrān anye pitṝn anye punar yuddham arocayan
GE07mbh_09_u:3068: 09,024.013a sajjayitvā rathān ke cid yathāmukhyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:3072: 09,024.015a āgamya sahasā ke cid rathaiḥ svarṇavibhūṣitaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3076: 09,024.017a pāñcālyas tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3079: 09,024.018a tatas tv āpatatas tasya tava putro janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:3080: 09,024.018c bāṇasaṃghān anekān vai preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:3082: 09,024.019a dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato rājaṃs tava putreṇa dhanvinā
GE07mbh_09_u:3083: 09,024.019c nārācair bahubhiḥ kṣipraṃ bāhvor urasi cārpitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3088: 09,024.020c tasyāśvāṃś caturo bāṇaiḥ preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_09_u:3089: 09,024.020e sāratheś cāsya bhallena śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
GE07mbh_09_u:3090: 09,024.021a tato duryodhano rājā pṛṣṭham āruhya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3092: 09,024.022a dṛṣṭvā tu hatavikrāntaṃ svam anīkaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3093: 09,024.022c tava putro mahārāja prayayau yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3096: 09,024.024a te vṛtāḥ samare pañca gajānīkena bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:3097: 09,024.024c aśobhanta naravyāghrā grahā vyāptā ghanair iva
GE07mbh_09_u:3104: 09,024.028a bhīmasenas tu tān dṛṣṭvā nāgān mattagajopamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3105: 09,024.028c kareṇa gṛhya mahatīṃ gadām abhyapatad balī
GE07mbh_09_u:3109: 09,024.029e āvignaṃ ca balaṃ sarvaṃ gadāhaste vṛkodare
GE07mbh_09_u:3115: 09,024.032a tān bhinnakumbhān subahūn dravamāṇān itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3116: 09,024.032c patamānāṃś ca saṃprekṣya vitresus tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3118: 09,024.033c gṛdhrapakṣaiḥ śitair bāṇair jaghnur vai gajayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3121: 09,024.035a dṛṣṭvā ca pāṇḍavān sarvān kuñjaraiḥ parivāritān
GE07mbh_09_u:3125: 09,024.036c aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3126: 09,024.036e apṛcchan kṣatriyāṃs tatra kva nu duryodhano gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3128: 09,024.037c manvānā nihataṃ tatra tava putraṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3130: 09,024.038a āhuḥ ke cid dhate sūte prayāto yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3131: 09,024.038c apare tv abruvaṃs tatra kṣatriyā bhṛśavikṣatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3132: 09,024.039a duryodhanena kiṃ kāryaṃ drakṣyadhvaṃ yadi jīvati
GE07mbh_09_u:3133: 09,024.039c yudhyadhvaṃ sahitāḥ sarve kiṃ vo rājā kariṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:3134: 09,024.039d*0144_01 tatas te kṣatriyāḥ sarve svadharmeṣu vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3137: 09,024.041a idaṃ sarvaṃ balaṃ hanmo yena sma parivāritāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3138: 09,024.041c ete sarve gajān hatvā upayānti sma pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3139: 09,024.042a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣām aśvatthāmā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3141: 09,024.043a kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca prayayur yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3144: 09,024.044c āyayuḥ pāṇḍavā rājan vinighnantaḥ sma tāvakān
GE07mbh_09_u:3145: 09,024.045a dṛṣṭvā tu tān āpatataḥ saṃprahṛṣṭān mahārathān
GE07mbh_09_u:3146: 09,024.045c parākrāntāṃs tato vīrān nirāśāñ jīvite tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:3149: 09,024.046c rājan balena dvyaṅgena tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3151: 09,024.047c tasmin deśe vyavasthāpya yatra śāradvataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3153: 09,024.048c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahānīkaṃ tatra no 'bhūd raṇo mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:3154: 09,024.048e jitās tena vayaṃ sarve vyapayāma raṇāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3156: 09,024.049c rathaiś catuḥśatair vīro māṃ cābhyadravad āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:3157: 09,024.050a dhṛṣṭadyumnād ahaṃ muktaḥ kathaṃ cic chrāntavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3159: 09,024.050e tatra yuddham abhūd ghoraṃ muhūrtam atidāruṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:3160: 09,024.051a sātyakis tu mahābāhur mama hatvā paricchadam
GE07mbh_09_u:3161: 09,024.051c jīvagrāham agṛhṇān māṃ mūrchitaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:3162: 09,024.051d*0145_01 sarve jayāya dhāvanti mayā labdho 'dya saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3163: 09,024.051d*0145_02 iti bruvāṇaḥ śaineyo rājan mām agrahīt tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:3164: 09,024.052a tato muhūrtād iva tad gajānīkam avadhyata
GE07mbh_09_u:3171: 09,024.055a aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3173: 09,024.055e rājānaṃ mṛgayām āsus tava putraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:3174: 09,024.056a parityajya ca pāñcālaṃ prayātā yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3179: 09,025.002a carantaṃ ca tathā dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenam ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_09_u:3181: 09,025.003a sametya samare rājan hataśeṣāḥ sutās tava
GE07mbh_09_u:3191: 09,025.004c ity ete sahitā bhūtvā tava putrāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3193: 09,025.005a tato bhīmo mahārāja svarathaṃ punar āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3194: 09,025.005c mumoca niśitān bāṇān putrāṇāṃ tava marmasu
GE07mbh_09_u:3195: 09,025.006a te kīryamāṇā bhīmena putrās tava mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:3198: 09,025.007a tataḥ kruddho raṇe bhīmaḥ śiro durmarṣaṇasya ha
GE07mbh_09_u:3201: 09,025.008c śrutāntam avadhīd bhīmas tava putraṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3202: 09,025.009a jayatsenaṃ tato viddhvā nārācena hasann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:3204: 09,025.009e sa papāta rathād rājan bhūmau tūrṇaṃ mamāra ca
GE07mbh_09_u:3205: 09,025.010a śrutarvā tu tato bhīmaṃ kruddho vivyādha māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:3207: 09,025.011a tataḥ kruddho raṇe bhīmo jaitraṃ bhūribalaṃ ravim
GE07mbh_09_u:3208: 09,025.011c trīn etāṃs tribhir ānarchad viṣāgnipratimaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3209: 09,025.012a te hatā nyapatan bhūmau syandanebhyo mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3213: 09,025.014a sa hataḥ prāpatad bhūmau svarathād rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3214: 09,025.014c gires tu kūṭajo bhagno māruteneva pādapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3215: 09,025.015a duṣpradharṣaṃ tataś caiva sujātaṃ ca sutau tava
GE07mbh_09_u:3216: 09,025.015c ekaikaṃ nyavadhīt saṃkhye dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ camūmukhe
GE07mbh_09_u:3218: 09,025.016a tato yatantam aparam abhivīkṣya sutaṃ tava

GE07mbh_09_u:3228: 09,025.020c avākirat tava sutaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:3229: 09,025.021a mahad āsīt tayor yuddhaṃ citrarūpaṃ bhayānakam
GE07mbh_09_u:3231: 09,025.022a tayos tatra śarair muktair yamadaṇḍanibhaiḥ śubhaiḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:3235: 09,025.023c bhīmasenaṃ raṇe rājan bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_09_u:3238: 09,025.025a tato bhīmo ruṣāviṣṭaḥ putrasya tava māriṣa

GE07mbh_09_u:3244: 09,025.027e kṣurapreṇa śiraḥ kāyāt pātayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:3251: 09,025.030e te tu taṃ vai samāsādya parivavruḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3252: 09,025.031a tatas tu saṃvṛto bhīmas tāvakair niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3253: 09,025.031c pīḍayām āsa tān sarvān sahasrākṣa ivāsurān
GE07mbh_09_u:3257: 09,025.033c vājināṃ ca śatāny aṣṭau pāṇḍavaḥ sma virājate
GE07mbh_09_u:3258: 09,025.034a bhīmasenas tu kaunteyo hatvā yuddhe sutāṃs tava
GE07mbh_09_u:3259: 09,025.034c mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ saphalaṃ janma ca prabho

GE07mbh_09_u:3261: 09,025.035c īkṣituṃ notsahante sma tava sainyāni bhārata

GE07mbh_09_u:4247: 09,031.052e imam ekaṃ ca te kāmaṃ vīra bhūyo dadāmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:4249: 09,031.053c taṃ hatvā vai bhavān rājā hato vā svargam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_09_u:4250: 09,031.053e ṛte ca jīvitād vīra yuddhe kiṃ kurma te priyam
GE07mbh_09_u:4252: 09,031.054a tatas tava suto rājan varma jagrāha kāñcanam
GE07mbh_09_u:4255: 09,031.055c rarāja rājan putras te kāñcanaḥ śailarāḍ iva
GE07mbh_09_u:4256: 09,031.056a saṃnaddhaḥ sa gadī rājan sajjaḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhani
GE07mbh_09_u:4257: 09,031.056c abravīt pāṇḍavān sarvān putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_09_u:4258: 09,031.057a bhrātṝṇāṃ bhavatām eko yudhyatāṃ gadayā mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:4259: 09,031.057c sahadevena vā yotsye bhīmena nakulena vā
GE07mbh_09_u:4260: 09,031.058a atha vā phalgunenādya tvayā vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:4261: 09,031.058c yotsye 'haṃ saṃgaraṃ prāpya vijeṣye ca raṇājire
GE07mbh_09_u:4264: 09,031.060a gadāyuddhe na me kaś cit sadṛśo 'stīti cintaya
GE07mbh_09_u:4265: 09,031.060c gadayā vo haniṣyāmi sarvān eva samāgatān
GE07mbh_09_u:4266: 09,031.060d*0198_01 na me samarthāḥ sarve vai yoddhuṃ nyāyena ke cana
GE07mbh_09_u:4267: 09,031.060d*0198_02 na yuktam ātmanā vaktum evaṃ garvoddhataṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4268: 09,031.060d*0198_03 atha vā saphalaṃ hy etat kariṣye bhavatāṃ puraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4269: 09,031.060d*0198_04 asmin muhūrte satyaṃ vā mithyā vaitad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:4270: 09,031.060e gṛhṇātu sa gadāṃ yo vai yudhyate 'dya mayā saha
GE07mbh_09_u:4272: 09,032.001a evaṃ duryodhane rājan garjamāne muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4274: 09,032.002a yadi nāma hy ayaṃ yuddhe varayet tvāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_09_u:4275: 09,032.002c arjunaṃ nakulaṃ vāpi sahadevam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_09_u:4276: 09,032.003a kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ rājaṃs tvayā vyāhṛtam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:4277: 09,032.003c ekam eva nihatyājau bhava rājā kuruṣv iti
GE07mbh_09_u:4278: 09,032.004a etena hi kṛtā yogyā varṣāṇīha trayodaśa
GE07mbh_09_u:4279: 09,032.004b*0199_01 yat tvayā hi kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ bhīmasenajighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_09_u:4282: 09,032.005a kathaṃ nāma bhavet kāryam asmābhir bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:4283: 09,032.005c sāhasaṃ kṛtavāṃs tvaṃ tu hy anukrośān nṛpottama
GE07mbh_09_u:4285: 09,032.006c ṛte vṛkodarāt pārthāt sa ca nātikṛtaśramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4286: 09,032.007a tad idaṃ dyūtam ārabdhaṃ punar eva yathā purā
GE07mbh_09_u:4287: 09,032.007c viṣamaṃ śakuneś caiva tava caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:4288: 09,032.008a balī bhīmaḥ samarthaś ca kṛtī rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4289: 09,032.008c balavān vā kṛtī veti kṛtī rājan viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_09_u:4290: 09,032.009a so 'yaṃ rājaṃs tvayā śatruḥ same pathi niveśitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4291: 09,032.009c nyastaś cātmā suviṣame kṛcchram āpāditā vayam
GE07mbh_09_u:4292: 09,032.010a ko nu sarvān vinirjitya śatrūn ekena vairiṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:4294: 09,032.010d*0200_01 kṛcchraprāptena ca tathā hārayed rājyam āgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:4295: 09,032.011a na hi paśyāmi taṃ loke gadāhastaṃ narottamam
GE07mbh_09_u:4297: 09,032.011c yudhyed duryodhanaṃ saṃkhye kṛtitvād dhi viśeṣayet
GE07mbh_09_u:4298: 09,032.011d*0201_02 gadāhastaṃ vijetuṃ vai śaktaḥ syād amaro 'pi hi
GE07mbh_09_u:4299: 09,032.012a phalgunaṃ vā bhavantaṃ vā mādrīputrāv athāpi vā
GE07mbh_09_u:4300: 09,032.012b*0201_03 na tvaṃ bhīmo na nakulaḥ sahadevo 'tha phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4301: 09,032.012c na samarthān ahaṃ manye gadāhastasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:4302: 09,032.012d*0201_04 jetuṃ nyāyena śakto vai kṛtī rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4303: 09,032.013a sa kathaṃ vadase śatruṃ yudhyasva gadayeti ha
GE07mbh_09_u:4304: 09,032.013c ekaṃ ca no nihatyājau bhava rājeti bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:4305: 09,032.014a vṛkodaraṃ samāsādya saṃśayo vijaye hi naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4306: 09,032.014c nyāyato yudhyamānānāṃ kṛtī hy eṣa mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4307: 09,032.014d*0202_01 ekaṃ vāsmān nihatya tvaṃ bhava rājeti vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4308: 09,032.014d*0202_02 nūnaṃ na rājyabhāgeṣā pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāś ca saṃtatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4313: 09,032.016a ahaṃ suyodhanaṃ saṃkhye haniṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4314: 09,032.016c vijayo vai dhruvaṃ kṛṣṇa dharmarājasya dṛśyate
GE07mbh_09_u:4316: 09,032.017c na tathā dhārtarāṣṭrasya mā kārṣīr mādhava vyathām
GE07mbh_09_u:4317: 09,032.017d*0203_01 anayā gadayā cāhaṃ saṃyuge yoddhum utsahe
GE07mbh_09_u:4318: 09,032.017d*0203_02 bhavantaḥ prekṣakāḥ sarve mama santu janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:4319: 09,032.018a sāmarān api lokāṃs trīn nānāśastradharān yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:4320: 09,032.018c yodhayeyaṃ raṇe hṛṣṭaḥ kim utādya suyodhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:4324: 09,032.019@002_0003 muhur muhur balāmāne kṣveḍāṃ muñcati cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_09_u:4328: 09,032.019@002_0007 naitac citraṃ mahābāho hanyās tvaṃ yat suyodhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:4329: 09,032.019@002_0008 yena vaiśravaṇo yuddhe maṇibhadraś ca yakṣarāṭ
GE07mbh_09_u:4331: 09,032.019@002_0010 tasya te gaṇanāṃ yuddhe kaḥ kuryād dhṛtarāṣṭraje
GE07mbh_09_u:4333: 09,032.019@002_0012 bakaṃ taddviguṇaṃ saṃkhye kirmīraṃ ca caturguṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:4335: 09,032.019@002_0014 sa tvaṃ nihantā kauravyam atra kasyāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4339: 09,032.019@002_0018 vipriyaṃ bhīmasenasya kṛtvā ko 'sti sukhī naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4340: 09,032.019@002_0019 sātyakiḥ prāha kṛṣṇātmā bhīmaṃ saṃvīkṣya keśavam
GE07mbh_09_u:4342: 09,032.019@002_0021 girīn aśeṣān saṃkruddhaś cūrṇayed yaḥ kṣaṇena ha
GE07mbh_09_u:4344: 09,032.019@002_0023 gajair gajān hayair aśvān rathāṃś caiva rathais tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:4345: 09,032.019@002_0024 apātayat samakṣaṃ te mama prītyartham eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:4346: 09,032.019@002_0025 tathā saṃpūjayām āsa śauryaṃ bhīmasya phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4347: 09,032.019@002_0026 nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4350: 09,032.019@002_0029 vividhābhiś ca vāgbhiś ca pūjayām āsur ādṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4353: 09,032.019@002_0032 pāṇḍavaḥ saha pāñcālaiḥ saṃstutaḥ karmabhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:4354: 09,032.019@002_0033 pūjitaś ca maheṣvāsas tadaiva tejito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:4357: 09,032.019@002_0036 keśavaṃ dharmarājaṃ ca samastān anujāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:4361: 09,032.019c hṛṣṭaḥ saṃpūjayām āsa vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:4363: 09,032.020c nihatāriḥ svakāṃ dīptāṃ śriyaṃ prāpto na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4365: 09,032.021c rājāno rājaputrāś ca nāgāś ca vinipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4366: 09,032.022a kaliṅgā māgadhāḥ prācyā gāndhārāḥ kuravas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:4370: 09,032.024a tvāṃ ca prāpya raṇe pāpo dhārtarāṣṭro vinaṅkṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:4371: 09,032.024c tvam asya sakthinī bhaṅktvā pratijñāṃ pārayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_09_u:4372: 09,032.025a yatnena tu sadā pārtha yoddhavyo dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4373: 09,032.025c kṛtī ca balavāṃś caiva yuddhaśauṇḍaś ca nityadā
GE07mbh_09_u:4374: 09,032.026a tatas tu sātyakī rājan pūjayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:4375: 09,032.026c vividhābhiś ca tāṃ vāgbhiḥ pūjayām āsa mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4379: 09,032.028c sṛñjayaiḥ saha tiṣṭhantaṃ tapantam iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_09_u:4380: 09,032.029a aham etena saṃgamya saṃyuge yoddhum utsahe
GE07mbh_09_u:4381: 09,032.029c na hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ mām eṣa puruṣādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4382: 09,032.030a adya krodhaṃ vimokṣyāmi nihitaṃ hṛdaye bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:4385: 09,032.031c nihatya gadayā pāpam adya rājan sukhī bhava
GE07mbh_09_u:4387: 09,032.032c prāṇāñ śriyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca mokṣyate 'dya suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4388: 09,032.033a rājā ca dhṛtarāṣṭro 'dya śrutvā putraṃ mayā hatam
GE07mbh_09_u:4389: 09,032.033c smariṣyaty aśubhaṃ karma yat tac chakunibuddhijam
GE07mbh_09_u:4390: 09,032.034a ity uktvā bharataśreṣṭho gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:4392: 09,032.034d*0204_01 tad āhvānam amṛṣyan vai tava putro 'tivīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:4393: 09,032.034d*0204_02 pratyupasthita evāśu matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_09_u:4395: 09,032.034d*0204_04 dadṛśuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:4398: 09,032.035d*0205_01 na saṃbhramo na ca bhayaṃ na ca glānir na ca vyathā
GE07mbh_09_u:4400: 09,032.036a tam udyatagadaṃ dṛṣṭvā kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:4402: 09,032.037a rājñāpi dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa tvayā cāsmāsu yat kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:4403: 09,032.037c smara tad duṣkṛtaṃ karma yad vṛttaṃ vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_09_u:4405: 09,032.038c dyūte yad vijito rājā śakuner buddhiniścayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:4406: 09,032.039a yāni cānyāni duṣṭātman pāpāni kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_09_u:4407: 09,032.039c anāgaḥsu ca pārtheṣu tasya paśya mahat phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:4410: 09,032.041a hato droṇaś ca karṇaś ca hataḥ śalyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:4412: 09,032.042a bhrātaras te hatāḥ śūrāḥ putrāś ca sahasainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4413: 09,032.042c rājānaś ca hatāḥ śūrāḥ samareṣv anivartinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4414: 09,032.043a ete cānye ca nihatā bahavaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4415: 09,032.043c prātikāmī tathā pāpo draupadyāḥ kleśakṛd dhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4417: 09,032.044c tvām apy adya haniṣyāmi gadayā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4418: 09,032.045a adya te 'haṃ raṇe darpaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayitā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:4419: 09,032.045c rājyāśāṃ vipulāṃ rājan pāṇḍaveṣu ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:4421: 09,032.046a kiṃ katthitena bahudhā yudhyasvādya mayā saha
GE07mbh_09_u:4423: 09,032.047a kiṃ na paśyasi māṃ pāpa gadāyuddhe vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:4425: 09,032.048a gadinaṃ ko 'dya māṃ pāpa jetum utsahate ripuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4427: 09,032.048d*0206_01 yad etat kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ madīyaṃ durviceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_09_u:4428: 09,032.048d*0206_02 sarvaṃ tan na ca me kiṃ cic chaṅkitaṃ kartum eva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:4429: 09,032.048d*0206_03 araṇye cāpi vasatiṃ dāsyaṃ ca paraveśmasu
GE07mbh_09_u:4431: 09,032.048d*0206_05 hatāś ca bāndhavās tubhyaṃ kṣayas tulyo 'yam āvayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4432: 09,032.048d*0206_06 patanaṃ saṃprati tu me yadi nāma bhaved yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:4433: 09,032.048d*0206_07 tad atiślāghyam eva syāt kālo vā tatra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:4434: 09,032.048d*0206_08 adyāpi hi na me jetā dharmeṇāsti raṇājire
GE07mbh_09_u:4435: 09,032.048d*0206_09 chadmanā yadi jeṣyadhvam akīrtiḥ sthāsyati dhruvam
GE07mbh_09_u:4436: 09,032.048d*0206_10 adharmyā vāyaśasyā ca paścāt tapsyatha vai dhruvam
GE07mbh_09_u:4437: 09,032.049a mā vṛthā garja kaunteya śāradābhram ivājalam
GE07mbh_09_u:4438: 09,032.049c darśayasva balaṃ yuddhe yāvat tat te 'dya vidyate
GE07mbh_09_u:4439: 09,032.050a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pāñcālāḥ sahasṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4440: 09,032.050c sarve saṃpūjayām āsus tad vaco vijigīṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4441: 09,032.051a taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ talaśabdena mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4442: 09,032.051c bhūyaḥ saṃharṣayām āsū rājan duryodhanaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:4443: 09,032.052a bṛṃhanti kuñjarās tatra hayā heṣanti cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_09_u:4448: 09,033.002a tatas tāladhvajo rāmas tayor yuddha upasthite
GE07mbh_09_u:4449: 09,033.002c śrutvā tac chiṣyayo rājann ājagāma halāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4452: 09,033.003b*0207_02 pūjayitvā tataḥ paścād idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:4453: 09,033.003c śiṣyayoḥ kauśalaṃ yuddhe paśya rāmeti cābruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:4454: 09,033.004a abravīc ca tadā rāmo dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:4456: 09,033.005a catvāriṃśad ahāny adya dve ca me niḥsṛtasya vai
GE07mbh_09_u:4465: 09,033.008a mādrīputrau tathā śūrau draupadyāḥ pañca cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4469: 09,033.009d*0209_01 abhivādya tatas tau tu sasvajāte halāyudham
GE07mbh_09_u:4470: 09,033.010a svāgatena ca te tatra pratipūjya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4471: 09,033.010c paśya yuddhaṃ mahābāho iti te rāmam abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:4473: 09,033.011a pariṣvajya tadā rāmaḥ pāṇḍavān sṛñjayān api
GE07mbh_09_u:4475: 09,033.011e tathaiva te samāsādya papracchus tam anāmayam
GE07mbh_09_u:4476: 09,033.012a pratyabhyarcya halī sarvān kṣatriyāṃś ca mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4478: 09,033.013a janārdanaṃ sātyakiṃ ca premṇā sa pariṣasvaje
GE07mbh_09_u:4480: 09,033.014a tau cainaṃ vidhivad rājan pūjayām āsatur gurum
GE07mbh_09_u:4481: 09,033.014c brahmāṇam iva deveśam indropendrau mudā yutau
GE07mbh_09_u:4483: 09,033.015c idaṃ bhrātror mahāyuddhaṃ paśya rāmeti bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:4489: 09,033.018c āsīd antakaro rājan vairasya tava putrayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4491: 09,034.001a pūrvam eva yadā rāmas tasmin yuddha upasthite
GE07mbh_09_u:4492: 09,034.001c āmantrya keśavaṃ yāto vṛṣṇibhiḥ sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4493: 09,034.002a sāhāyyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya na ca kartāsmi keśava
GE07mbh_09_u:4495: 09,034.003a evam uktvā tadā rāmo yātaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4496: 09,034.003c tasya cāgamanaṃ bhūyo brahmañ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:4497: 09,034.004a ākhyāhi me vistarataḥ kathaṃ rāma upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4498: 09,034.004c kathaṃ ca dṛṣṭavān yuddhaṃ kuśalo hy asi sattama
GE07mbh_09_u:4503: 09,034.006a sa gatvā hāstinapuraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ sametya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:4504: 09,034.006c uktavān vacanaṃ tathyaṃ hitaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4505: 09,034.006e na ca tat kṛtavān rājā yathākhyātaṃ hi te purā
GE07mbh_09_u:4511: 09,034.008d*0211_01 yathoktaṃ ca yathāvṛttam uktvā pāṇḍavam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:4512: 09,034.009a na kurvanti vaco mahyaṃ kuravaḥ kālacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4517: 09,034.011c kriyatām iti tat kṛṣṇo nāsya cakre vacas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:4518: 09,034.011d*0212_01 dhīmān arivināśāya kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sadā hariḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4519: 09,034.011d*0212_02 sasmāra sa tadā tatra idaṃ tatra punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4523: 09,034.013a āśrayām āsa bhojas tu duryodhanam ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4527: 09,034.015a gacchann eva pathisthas tu rāmaḥ preṣyān uvāca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:4529: 09,034.015e ānayadhvaṃ dvārakāyā agnīn vai yājakāṃs tathā
