GE07mbh_09_u:4793: 09,035.045c yaś cehopaspṛśet kūpe sa somapagatiṃ labhet
GE07mbh_09_u:4795: 09,035.046b*0222_01 ājagāma drutaṃ prītā tasmin kūpe sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4797: 09,035.047a tatheti coktvā vibudhā jagmū rājan yathāgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:4798: 09,035.047c tritaś cāpy agamat prītaḥ svam eva nilayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:4799: 09,035.048a kruddhaḥ sa tu samāsādya tāv ṛṣī bhrātarau tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:4800: 09,035.048c uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ śaśāpa ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4801: 09,035.049a paśulubdhau yuvāṃ yasmān mām utsṛjya pradhāvitau
GE07mbh_09_u:4802: 09,035.049c tasmād rūpeṇa teṣāṃ vai daṃṣṭriṇām abhitaś carau
GE07mbh_09_u:4805: 09,035.051a ity ukte tu tadā tena kṣaṇād eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:4808: 09,035.052c dattvā ca vividhān dāyān pūjayitvā ca vai dvijān
GE07mbh_09_u:4809: 09,035.053a udapānaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4813: 09,036.001c śūdrābhīrān prati dveṣād yatra naṣṭā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4814: 09,036.002a yasmāt sā bharataśreṣṭha dveṣān naṣṭā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4815: 09,036.002c tasmāt tad ṛṣayo nityaṃ prāhur vinaśaneti ha
GE07mbh_09_u:4816: 09,036.003a tac cāpy upaspṛśya balaḥ sarasvatyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4820: 09,036.005a tatra devāḥ sagandharvā māsi māsi janeśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:4824: 09,036.007a tatra modanti devāś ca pitaraś ca savīrudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4825: 09,036.007c puṇyaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sadā divyaiḥ kīryamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4826: 09,036.008a ākrīḍabhūmiḥ sā rājaṃs tāsām apsarasāṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_09_u:4828: 09,036.009a tatra snātvā ca dattvā ca vasu vipreṣu mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4829: 09,036.009c śrutvā gītaṃ ca tad divyaṃ vāditrāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam
GE07mbh_09_u:4834: 09,036.012a tatra dattvā haladharo viprebhyo vividhaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_09_u:4836: 09,036.013a bhojayitvā dvijān kāmaiḥ saṃtarpya ca mahādhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4837: 09,036.013c prayayau sahito vipraiḥ stūyamānaś ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4842: 09,036.016a utpātā dāruṇāś caiva śubhāś ca janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:4843: 09,036.016c sarasvatyāḥ śubhe tīrthe vihitā vai mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:4844: 09,036.016e tasya nāmnā ca tat tīrthaṃ gargasrota iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:4845: 09,036.017a tatra gargaṃ mahābhāgam ṛṣayaḥ suvratā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:4846: 09,036.017c upāsāṃ cakrire nityaṃ kālajñānaṃ prati prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:4848: 09,036.018c vidhivad dhi dhanaṃ dattvā munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:4849: 09,036.019a uccāvacāṃs tathā bhakṣyān dvijebhyo vipradāya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4853: 09,036.020e sarasvatyās taṭe jātaṃ nagaṃ tāladhvajo balī
GE07mbh_09_u:4856: 09,036.022a te sarve hy aśanaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ tasya vanaspateḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4857: 09,036.022c vrataiś ca niyamaiś caiva kāle kāle sma bhuñjate
GE07mbh_09_u:4858: 09,036.023a prāptaiś ca niyamais tais tair vicarantaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_09_u:4860: 09,036.024a evaṃ khyāto narapate loke 'smin sa vanaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4862: 09,036.025a tasmiṃś ca yaduśārdūlo dattvā tīrthe yaśasvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:4864: 09,036.026a pūjayitvā dvijāṃś caiva pūjitaś ca tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4866: 09,036.027a tatra gatvā munīn dṛṣṭvā nānāveṣadharān balaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4867: 09,036.027c āplutya salile cāpi pūjayām āsa vai dvijān
GE07mbh_09_u:4869: 09,036.028c tataḥ prāyād balo rājan dakṣiṇena sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:4877: 09,036.031e pannagebhyo bhayaṃ tatra vidyate na sma kaurava
GE07mbh_09_u:4879: 09,036.032c prāyāt prācīṃ diśaṃ rājan dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā
GE07mbh_09_u:4880: 09,036.032d*0223_01 tasyāṃ diśi vicitrāṇi tīrthāni paramāṇi ca
GE07mbh_09_u:4881: 09,036.033a āplutya bahuśo hṛṣṭas teṣu tīrtheṣu lāṅgalī
GE07mbh_09_u:4884: 09,036.034c tato rāmo 'gamat tīrtham ṛṣibhiḥ sevitaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:4885: 09,036.035a yatra bhūyo nivavṛte prāṅmukhā vai sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4888: 09,036.035b*0224_03 āplutya teṣu tīrtheṣu yathoktaṃ tatra carṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4890: 09,036.035b*0224_05 abhivādya munīṃs tāṃs tu tatra tīrthanivāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4892: 09,036.035b*0224_07 prāṅmukhaṃ vai nivavṛte vṛṣṭir vātahatā yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:4894: 09,036.036a nivṛttāṃ tāṃ saricchreṣṭhāṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā tu lāṅgalī
GE07mbh_09_u:4897: 09,036.037a kasmāt sarasvatī brahman nivṛttā prāṅmukhī tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4899: 09,036.038a kasmiṃś ca kāraṇe tatra vismito yadunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4906: 09,036.039b*0226_03 tṛṇāśinas tathā cānye mārgaśāyina eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:4910: 09,036.040a uṣitvā ca mahābhāgās tasmin satre yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_09_u:4913: 09,036.041a ṛṣīṇāṃ bahulatvāt tu sarasvatyā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:4914: 09,036.041c tīrthāni nagarāyante kūle vai dakṣiṇe tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:4917: 09,036.043a juhvatāṃ tatra teṣāṃ tu munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:4925: 09,036.046b*0227_02 sarvatithyupavāsāś ca tathā hy anye sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4930: 09,036.047a āsan vai munayas tatra sarasvatyāḥ samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4934: 09,036.049a tato yajñopavītais te tat tīrthaṃ nirmimāya vai
GE07mbh_09_u:4935: 09,036.049c juhuvuś cāgnihotrāṇi cakruś ca vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4937: 09,036.050c darśayām āsa rājendra teṣām arthe sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4938: 09,036.051a tataḥ kuñjān bahūn kṛtvā saṃnivṛttā saridvarā
GE07mbh_09_u:4940: 09,036.052a tato nivṛtya rājendra teṣām arthe sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4942: 09,036.053a amoghā gamanaṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ bhūyo vrajāmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:4943: 09,036.053c ity adbhutaṃ mahac cakre tato rājan mahānadī
GE07mbh_09_u:4944: 09,036.053d*0228_01 tatraiva kuñjamadhye tu sā jagāma sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4946: 09,036.054a evaṃ sa kuñjo rājendra naimiṣeya iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4948: 09,036.055a tatra kuñjān bahūn dṛṣṭvā saṃnivṛttāṃ ca tāṃ nadīm
GE07mbh_09_u:4951: 09,036.056c dattvā dāyān dvijātibhyo bhāṇḍāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:4952: 09,036.056e bhakṣyaṃ peyaṃ ca vividhaṃ brāhmaṇān pratyapādayat
GE07mbh_09_u:4953: 09,036.057a tataḥ prāyād balo rājan pūjyamāno dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4957: 09,036.058c panasaiś ca palāśaiś ca karīraiḥ pīlubhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:4958: 09,036.058d*0231_01 sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kakubhaiś ca saketakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4968: 09,036.063c yatra maṅkaṇakaḥ siddhas tapas tepe mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4970: 09,037.001a saptasārasvataṃ kasmāt kaś ca maṅkaṇako muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4971: 09,037.001c kathaṃ siddhaś ca bhagavān kaś cāsya niyamo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:4972: 09,037.002a kasya vaṃśe samutpannaḥ kiṃ cādhītaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_09_u:4973: 09,037.002c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vidhivad dvijasattama
GE07mbh_09_u:4975: 09,037.003a rājan sapta sarasvatyo yābhir vyāptam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_09_u:4976: 09,037.003c āhūtā balavadbhir hi tatra tatra sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4982: 09,037.006c deveṣu caiva vyagreṣu tasmin yajñavidhau tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:4985: 09,037.008a manasā cintitā hy arthā dharmārthakuśalais tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:4986: 09,037.008c upatiṣṭhanti rājendra dvijātīṃs tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:4987: 09,037.009a jaguś ca tatra gandharvā nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4988: 09,037.009c vāditrāṇi ca divyāni vādayām āsur añjasā
GE07mbh_09_u:4989: 09,037.010a tasya yajñasya saṃpattyā tutuṣur devatā api
GE07mbh_09_u:4990: 09,037.010c vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmuḥ kim u mānuṣayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4992: 09,037.011c abruvann ṛṣayo rājan nāyaṃ yajño mahāphalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4993: 09,037.011e na dṛśyate saricchreṣṭhā yasmād iha sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4994: 09,037.012a tac chrutvā bhagavān prītaḥ sasmārātha sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:4996: 09,037.012e suprabhā nāma rājendra nāmnā tatra sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:4997: 09,037.013a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā munayas tuṣṭā vegayuktāṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:4998: 09,037.013c pitāmahaṃ mānayantīṃ kratuṃ te bahu menire
GE07mbh_09_u:5002: 09,037.015c tatra citrāḥ kathā hy āsan vedaṃ prati janeśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:5003: 09,037.016a tatra te munayo hy āsan nānāsvādhyāyavedinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5004: 09,037.016c te samāgamya munayaḥ sasmarur vai sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:5005: 09,037.017a sā tu dhyātā mahārāja ṛṣibhiḥ satrayājibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5009: 09,037.018c āgatā saritāṃ śreṣṭhā tatra bhārata pūjitā
GE07mbh_09_u:5012: 09,037.020a viśālāṃ tu gayeṣv āhur ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5014: 09,037.021a auddālakes tathā yajñe yajatas tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:5015: 09,037.021c samete sarvataḥ sphīte munīnāṃ maṇḍale tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:5020: 09,037.023e manohradeti vikhyātā sā hi tair manasā hṛtā
GE07mbh_09_u:5029: 09,037.026e samāhūtā yayau tatra puṇye haimavate girau
GE07mbh_09_u:5030: 09,037.027a ekībhūtās tatas tās tu tasmiṃs tīrthe samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5031: 09,037.027c saptasārasvataṃ tīrthaṃ tatas tat prathitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:5033: 09,037.028c saptasārasvataṃ caiva tīrthaṃ puṇyaṃ tathā smṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:5036: 09,037.030a dṛṣṭvā yadṛcchayā tatra striyam ambhasi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:5039: 09,037.031a tad retaḥ sa tu jagrāha kalaśe vai mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5041: 09,037.031c saptadhā pravibhāgaṃ tu kalaśasthaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:5042: 09,037.031e tatrarṣayaḥ sapta jātā jajñire marutāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5046: 09,037.033a idam anyac ca rājendra śṛṇv āścaryataraṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:5047: 09,037.033c maharṣeś caritaṃ yādṛk triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:5048: 09,037.034a purā maṅkaṇakaḥ siddhaḥ kuśāgreṇeti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:5049: 09,037.034c kṣataḥ kila kare rājaṃs tasya śākaraso 'sravat
GE07mbh_09_u:5050: 09,037.034e sa vi śākarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣāviṣṭaḥ pranṛttavān
GE07mbh_09_u:5051: 09,037.035a tatas tasmin pranṛtte vai sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_09_u:5052: 09,037.035c pranṛttam ubhayaṃ vīra tejasā tasya mohitam
GE07mbh_09_u:5053: 09,037.036a brahmādibhiḥ surai rājann ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5054: 09,037.036c vijñapto vai mahādeva ṛṣer arthe narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:5055: 09,037.036e nāyaṃ nṛtyed yathā deva tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:5056: 09,037.037a tato devo muniṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣāviṣṭam atīva ha
GE07mbh_09_u:5058: 09,037.038a bho bho brāhmaṇa dharmajña kimarthaṃ narinartsi vai
GE07mbh_09_u:5062: 09,037.039a kiṃ na paśyasi me brahman karāc chākarasaṃ srutam
GE07mbh_09_u:5063: 09,037.039c yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai pranṛtto 'haṃ harṣeṇa mahatā vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:5064: 09,037.040a taṃ prahasyābravīd devo muniṃ rāgeṇa mohitam
GE07mbh_09_u:5065: 09,037.040c ahaṃ na vismayaṃ vipra gacchāmīti prapaśya mām
GE07mbh_09_u:5068: 09,037.042a tato bhasma kṣatād rājan nirgataṃ himasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_09_u:5069: 09,037.042c tad dṛṣṭvā vrīḍito rājan sa muniḥ pādayor gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5070: 09,037.042d*0234_01 mene devaṃ mahādevam idaṃ covāca vismitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5073: 09,037.043a nānyaṃ devād ahaṃ manye rudrāt parataraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:5074: 09,037.043c surāsurasya jagato gatis tvam asi śūladhṛk
GE07mbh_09_u:5075: 09,037.044a tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ vadantīha manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5076: 09,037.044c tvām eva sarvaṃ viśati punar eva yugakṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:5077: 09,037.045a devair api na śakyas tvaṃ parijñātuṃ kuto mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:5078: 09,037.045c tvayi sarve sma dṛśyante surā brahmādayo 'nagha
GE07mbh_09_u:5081: 09,037.046a sarvas tvam asi devānāṃ kartā kārayitā ca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:5083: 09,037.046d*0237_01 tvaṃ prabhuḥ paramaiśvaryād adhikaṃ bhāsi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_09_u:5084: 09,037.046d*0237_02 tvayi brahmā ca viṣṇuś ca lokān saṃdhārya tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5085: 09,037.046d*0237_03 tvanmūlaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ tvadantaṃ ca maheśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:5086: 09,037.046d*0237_04 tvayā hi vitatā lokā sapteme sarvasaṃbhava
GE07mbh_09_u:5088: 09,037.046d*0237_06 tvanmayaṃ hi jagat sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_09_u:5090: 09,037.046d*0237_08 dadāsi ca prasannas tvaṃ bhaktānāṃ parameśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:5093: 09,037.046d*0237_11 na vṛthāsti mahādeva prasādas te maheśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:5095: 09,037.046d*0237_13 prapadye śaraṇaṃ śaṃbhuṃ sarvadā sarvataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:5096: 09,037.046d*0237_14 karmaṇā manasā vācā tam evābhijagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:5097: 09,037.047a evaṃ stutvā mahādevaṃ sa ṛṣiḥ praṇato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:5098: 09,037.047b*0238_01 yad idaṃ cāpalaṃ deva kṛtam etat smayādikam
GE07mbh_09_u:5099: 09,037.047c bhagavaṃs tvatprasādād vai tapo me na kṣared iti
GE07mbh_09_u:5100: 09,037.048a tato devaḥ prītamanās tam ṛṣiṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:5101: 09,037.048c tapas te vardhatāṃ vipra matprasādāt sahasradhā
GE07mbh_09_u:5102: 09,037.048e āśrame ceha vatsyāmi tvayā sārdham ahaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:5103: 09,037.049a saptasārasvate cāsmin yo mām arciṣyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5104: 09,037.049c na tasya durlabhaṃ kiṃ cid bhaviteha paratra ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5105: 09,037.049e sārasvataṃ ca lokaṃ te gamiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5107: 09,037.050b*0239_01 kathitaṃ ca nṛpatiśreṣṭha kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te
GE07mbh_09_u:5109: 09,037.050c sa hi putraḥ sajanyāyām utpanno mātariśvanā
GE07mbh_09_u:5112: 09,038.001c tathā maṅkaṇake prītiṃ śubhāṃ cakre halāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5113: 09,038.002a dattvā dānaṃ dvijātibhyo rajanīṃ tām upoṣya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5114: 09,038.002c pūjito munisaṃghaiś ca prātar utthāya lāṅgalī
GE07mbh_09_u:5115: 09,038.003a anujñāpya munīn sarvān spṛṣṭvā toyaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:5121: 09,038.006a tatra pūrvaṃ tapas taptaṃ kāvyena sumahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:5124: 09,038.007a tat prāpya ca balo rājaṃs tīrthapravaram uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:5125: 09,038.007c vidhivad dhi dadau vittaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:5128: 09,038.008c muktaḥ kathaṃ cāsya śiro lagnaṃ kena ca hetunā
GE07mbh_09_u:5134: 09,038.011a mahodarasya tal lagnaṃ jaṅghāyāṃ vai yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_09_u:5135: 09,038.011c vane vicarato rājann asthi bhittvāsphurat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:5136: 09,038.012a sa tena lagnena tadā dvijātir na śaśāka ha
GE07mbh_09_u:5139: 09,038.013c jagāma sarvatīrthāni pṛthivyām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:5140: 09,038.014a sa gatvā saritaḥ sarvāḥ samudrāṃś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5141: 09,038.014c kathayām āsa tat sarvam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:5142: 09,038.015a āplutaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu na ca mokṣam avāptavān
GE07mbh_09_u:5143: 09,038.015c sa tu śuśrāva viprendro munīnāṃ vacanaṃ mahat

GE07mbh_09_u:5437: 09,041.036a yasmān mā tvaṃ saricchreṣṭhe vañcayitvā punar gatā
GE07mbh_09_u:5441: 09,041.038a atharṣayaś ca devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5444: 09,041.039c āgacchac ca punar mārgaṃ svam eva saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:5446: 09,042.001a sā śaptā tena kruddhena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_09_u:5448: 09,042.002a athājagmus tato rājan rākṣasās tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:5449: 09,042.002c tatra te śoṇitaṃ sarve pibantaḥ sukham āsate
GE07mbh_09_u:5450: 09,042.003a tṛptāś ca subhṛśaṃ tena sukhitā vigatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5451: 09,042.003c nṛtyantaś ca hasantaś ca yathā svargajitas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5452: 09,042.004a kasya cit tv atha kālasya ṛṣayaḥ satapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5455: 09,042.005c prāpya prītiṃ parāṃ cāpi tapolubdhā viśāradāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5456: 09,042.005e prayayur hi tato rājan yena tīrthaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5457: 09,042.006a athāgamya mahābhāgās tat tīrthaṃ dāruṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:5460: 09,042.007a tān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān rājan munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5462: 09,042.008a te tu sarve mahābhāgāḥ samāgamya mahāvratāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5463: 09,042.008c āhūya saritāṃ śreṣṭhām idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:5464: 09,042.009a kāraṇaṃ brūhi kalyāṇi kimarthaṃ te hrado hy ayam
GE07mbh_09_u:5465: 09,042.009c evam ākulatāṃ yātaḥ śrutvā pāsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_09_u:5466: 09,042.010a tataḥ sā sarvam ācaṣṭa yathāvṛttaṃ pravepatī
GE07mbh_09_u:5467: 09,042.010c duḥkhitām atha tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ta ūcur vai tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5468: 09,042.011a kāraṇaṃ śrutam asmābhiḥ śāpaś caiva śruto 'naghe
GE07mbh_09_u:5469: 09,042.011c kariṣyanti tu yat prāptaṃ sarva eva tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5470: 09,042.012a evam uktvā saricchreṣṭhām ūcus te 'tha parasparam
GE07mbh_09_u:5472: 09,042.012d*0256_01 te sarve brāhmaṇā rājaṃs tapobhir niyamais tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5473: 09,042.012d*0256_02 upavāsaiś ca vividhair yamaiḥ kaṣṭavratais tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5475: 09,042.012d*0256_04 mokṣayām āsus tāṃ devīṃ saricchreṣṭhāṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:5476: 09,042.013a teṣāṃ tu vacanād eva prakṛtisthā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:5477: 09,042.013c prasannasalilā jajñe yathā pūrvaṃ tathaiva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:5478: 09,042.013d*0257_01 evam uktvā ca munayo duḥkhāc caināṃ vyamocayan
GE07mbh_09_u:5479: 09,042.013e vimuktā ca saricchreṣṭhā vibabhau sā yathā purā
GE07mbh_09_u:5480: 09,042.014a dṛṣṭvā toyaṃ sarasvatyā munibhis tais tathā kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:5481: 09,042.014b*0258_01 tān eva śaraṇaṃ jagmū rākṣasāḥ kṣudhitās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5483: 09,042.014e ūcus tān vai munīn sarvān kṛpāyuktān punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5484: 09,042.015a vayaṃ hi kṣudhitāś caiva dharmād dhīnāś ca śāśvatāt
GE07mbh_09_u:5485: 09,042.015c na ca naḥ kāmakāro 'yaṃ yad vayaṃ pāpakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5488: 09,042.017a evaṃ hi vaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5489: 09,042.017c ye brāhmaṇān pradviṣanti te bhavantīha rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5490: 09,042.018a ācāryam ṛtvijaṃ caiva guruṃ vṛddhajanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5495: 09,042.019c śaktā bhavantaḥ sarveṣāṃ lokānām api tāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:5496: 09,042.020a teṣāṃ te munayaḥ śrutvā tuṣṭuvus tāṃ mahānadīm
GE07mbh_09_u:5499: 09,042.021c keśāvapannam ādhūtam ārugṇam api yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:5500: 09,042.021d*0260_01 avadhūtam avijñātam atiśītaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:5501: 09,042.021d*0260_02 patitānnaṃ sūtikānnaṃ puṃścalyānnaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:5502: 09,042.021e śvabhiḥ saṃspṛṣṭam annaṃ ca bhāgo 'sau rakṣasām iha
GE07mbh_09_u:5503: 09,042.022a tasmāj jñātvā sadā vidvān etāny annāni varjayet
GE07mbh_09_u:5504: 09,042.022c rākṣasānnam asau bhuṅkte yo bhuṅkte hy annam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:5505: 09,042.023a śodhayitvā tatas tīrtham ṛṣayas te tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5506: 09,042.023c mokṣārthaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca nadīṃ tāṃ pratyacodayan
GE07mbh_09_u:5507: 09,042.024a maharṣīṇāṃ mataṃ jñātvā tataḥ sā saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:5508: 09,042.024c aruṇām ānayām āsa svāṃ tanuṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:5509: 09,042.025a tasyāṃ te rākṣasāḥ snātvā tanūs tyaktvā divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5512: 09,042.026c tasmiṃs tīrthavare snātvā vimuktaḥ pāpmanā kila
GE07mbh_09_u:5515: 09,042.027c katham asmiṃś ca tīrthe vai āplutyākalmaṣo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:5518: 09,042.028c yathā bibheda samayaṃ namucer vāsavaḥ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:5520: 09,042.029c tenendraḥ sakhyam akarot samayaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:5521: 09,042.030a nārdreṇa tvā na śuṣkeṇa na rātrau nāpi vāhani
GE07mbh_09_u:5522: 09,042.030c vadhiṣyāmy asuraśreṣṭha sakhe satyena te śape
GE07mbh_09_u:5523: 09,042.031a evaṃ sa kṛtvā samayaṃ sṛṣṭvā nīhāram īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5524: 09,042.031c cicchedāsya śiro rājann apāṃ phenena vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5525: 09,042.032a tac chiro namuceś chinnaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ śakram anvayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:5526: 09,042.032c he mitrahan pāpa iti bruvāṇaṃ śakram antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:5527: 09,042.033a evaṃ sa śirasā tena codyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5531: 09,042.034d*0261_01 eṣā puṇyajalā śakra kṛtā munibhir eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:5532: 09,042.034d*0261_02 nigūḍham asyā gamanam ihāsīt pūrvam eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:5535: 09,042.034d*0261_05 iha tvaṃ yaja devendra dada dānāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5537: 09,042.035a ity uktaḥ sa sarasvatyāḥ kuñje vai janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:5539: 09,042.036a sa muktaḥ pāpmanā tena brahmahatyākṛtena ha
GE07mbh_09_u:5541: 09,042.036b*0262_02 dattvā dānāny anekāni snātvā tīrthe śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5542: 09,042.036b*0262_03 vipāpmā virajāḥ śrīmān brahmavadhyāṃ vidhūya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5544: 09,042.037a śiras tac cāpi namuces tatraivāplutya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:5565: 09,043.002a yasmin kāle ca deśe ca yathā ca vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_09_u:5566: 09,043.002c yaiś cābhiṣikto bhagavān vidhinā yena ca prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5567: 09,043.003a skando yathā ca daityānām akarot kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:5568: 09,043.003c tathā me sarvam ācakṣva paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_09_u:5571: 09,043.004c harṣam utpādayaty etad vaco me janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:5574: 09,043.006a tejo māheśvaraṃ skannam agnau prapatitaṃ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:5575: 09,043.006c tat sarvabhakṣo bhagavān nāśakad dagdhum akṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:5577: 09,043.007c na caiva dhārayām āsa garbhaṃ tejomayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:5578: 09,043.008a sa gaṅgām abhisaṃgamya niyogād brahmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5580: 09,043.009a atha gaṅgāpi taṃ garbham asahantī vidhāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:5582: 09,043.010a sa tatra vavṛdhe lokān āvṛtya jvalanātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5583: 09,043.010c dadṛśur jvalanākāraṃ taṃ garbham atha kṛttikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5586: 09,043.012a tāsāṃ viditvā bhāvaṃ taṃ mātṝṇāṃ bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5587: 09,043.012c prasnutānāṃ payaḥ ṣaḍbhir vadanair apibat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:5588: 09,043.013a taṃ prabhāvaṃ samālakṣya tasya bālasya kṛttikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5591: 09,043.014c sa śailaḥ kāñcanaḥ sarvaḥ saṃbabhau kurusattama
GE07mbh_09_u:5592: 09,043.015a vardhatā caiva garbheṇa pṛthivī tena rañjitā
GE07mbh_09_u:5593: 09,043.015c ataś ca sarve saṃvṛttā girayaḥ kāñcanākarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5594: 09,043.016a kumāraś ca mahāvīryaḥ kārttikeya iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5596: 09,043.017a sa devas tapasā caiva vīryeṇa ca samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5598: 09,043.018a sa tasmin kāñcane divye śarastambe śriyā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5599: 09,043.018c stūyamānas tadā śete gandharvair munibhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5602: 09,043.020a anvāste ca nadī devaṃ gaṅgā vai saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:5603: 09,043.020c dadhāra pṛthivī cainaṃ bibhratī rūpam uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:5607: 09,043.022c tatrainaṃ samupātiṣṭhat sākṣād vāṇī ca kevalā
GE07mbh_09_u:5617: 09,043.027c sadṛśāni vapūṃṣy anye tatra tatra vyadhārayan
GE07mbh_09_u:5619: 09,043.028c ke cid añjanapuñjābhāḥ ke cic chvetācalaprabhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5621: 09,043.029c sādhyā viśve 'tha maruto vasavaḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5622: 09,043.030a rudrādityās tathā siddhā bhujagā dānavāḥ khagāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5623: 09,043.030c brahmā svayaṃbhūr bhagavān saputraḥ saha viṣṇunā
GE07mbh_09_u:5627: 09,043.032c ṛbhavo nāma varadā devānām api devatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5628: 09,043.032e te 'pi tatra samājagmur yāmā dhāmāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5632: 09,043.034c yugapac chailaputryāś ca gaṅgāyāḥ pāvakasya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5633: 09,043.035a kiṃ nu pūrvam ayaṃ bālo gauravād abhyupaiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:5634: 09,043.035c api mām iti sarveṣāṃ teṣām āsīn manogatam
GE07mbh_09_u:5635: 09,043.036a teṣām etam abhiprāyaṃ caturṇām upalakṣya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5636: 09,043.036c yugapad yogam āsthāya sasarja vividhās tanūḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5638: 09,043.037c skandaḥ śākho viśākhaś ca naigameṣaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5639: 09,043.038a evaṃ sa kṛtvā hy ātmānaṃ caturdhā bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5641: 09,043.039a viśākhas tu yayau yena devī girivarātmajā
GE07mbh_09_u:5642: 09,043.039c śākho yayau ca bhagavān vāyumūrtir vibhāvasum
GE07mbh_09_u:5645: 09,043.040c tān samabhyayur avyagrās tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:5647: 09,043.041c tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryam adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:5648: 09,043.042a tato rudraś ca devī ca pāvakaś ca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_09_u:5650: 09,043.043a praṇipatya tatas te tu vidhivad rājapuṃgava
GE07mbh_09_u:5655: 09,043.045c manasā cintayām āsa kim ayaṃ labhatām iti
GE07mbh_09_u:5659: 09,043.047c samarthaṃ ca tam aiśvarye mahāmatir amanyata
GE07mbh_09_u:5660: 09,043.048a tato muhūrtaṃ sa dhyātvā devānāṃ śreyasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5667: 09,043.051c samantapañcake yā vai triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
GE07mbh_09_u:5678: 09,044.004c dhātā caiva vidhātā ca tathā caivānilānalau
GE07mbh_09_u:5679: 09,044.005a pūṣṇā bhagenāryamṇā ca aṃśena ca vivasvatā
GE07mbh_09_u:5680: 09,044.005c rudraś ca sahito dhīmān mitreṇa varuṇena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5681: 09,044.006a rudrair vasubhir ādityair aśvibhyāṃ ca vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5682: 09,044.006c viśvedevair marudbhiś ca sādhyaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:5686: 09,044.008c bhṛgubhiś cāṅgirobhiś ca yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5687: 09,044.008e sarvair vidyādharaiḥ puṇyair yogasiddhais tathā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5688: 09,044.009a pitāmahaḥ pulastyaś ca pulahaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5689: 09,044.009c aṅgirāḥ kaśyapo 'triś ca marīcir bhṛgur eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5690: 09,044.010a kratur haraḥ pracetāś ca manur dakṣas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5691: 09,044.010c ṛtavaś ca grahāś caiva jyotīṃṣi ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:5692: 09,044.011a mūrtimatyaś ca sarito vedāś caiva sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5693: 09,044.011c samudrāś ca hradāś caiva tīrthāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5694: 09,044.011e pṛthivī dyaur diśaś caiva pādapāś ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:5695: 09,044.012a aditir devamātā ca hrīḥ śrīḥ svāhā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:5696: 09,044.012c umā śacī sinīvālī tathā cānumatiḥ kuhūḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5697: 09,044.012e rākā ca dhiṣaṇā caiva patnyaś cānyā divaukasām
GE07mbh_09_u:5698: 09,044.013a himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś cānekaśṛṅgavān
GE07mbh_09_u:5699: 09,044.013c airāvataḥ sānucaraḥ kalāḥ kāṣṭhās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5702: 09,044.014c aruṇo garuḍaś caiva vṛkṣāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:5703: 09,044.015a dharmaś ca bhagavān devaḥ samājagmur hi saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5704: 09,044.015c kālo yamaś ca mṛtyuś ca yamasyānucarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_09_u:5705: 09,044.016a bahulatvāc ca noktā ye vividhā devatāgaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5707: 09,044.017a jagṛhus te tadā rājan sarva eva divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5713: 09,044.020a purā yathā mahārāja varuṇaṃ vai jaleśvaram
GE07mbh_09_u:5715: 09,044.020e kaśyapaś ca mahātejā ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5716: 09,044.021a tasmai brahmā dadau prīto balino vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5723: 09,044.024a sa hi devāsure yuddhe daityānāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:5725: 09,044.025a tathā devā dadus tasmai senāṃ nairṛtasaṃkulām
GE07mbh_09_u:5727: 09,044.026a jayaśabdaṃ tataś cakrur devāḥ sarve savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5730: 09,044.027c unmāthaṃ ca pramāthaṃ ca mahāvīryau mahādyutī
GE07mbh_09_u:5731: 09,044.028a subhrājo bhāskaraś caiva yau tau sūryānuyāyinau
GE07mbh_09_u:5732: 09,044.028c tau sūryaḥ kārttikeyāya dadau prītaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:5734: 09,044.029c somo 'py anucarau prādān maṇiṃ sumaṇim eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5737: 09,044.031a parighaṃ ca vaṭaṃ caiva bhīmaṃ ca sumahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:5739: 09,044.031e aṃśo 'py anucarān pañca dadau skandāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_09_u:5742: 09,044.032e tau hi śatrūn mahendrasya jaghnatuḥ samare bahūn
GE07mbh_09_u:5743: 09,044.033a cakraṃ vikramakaṃ caiva saṃkramaṃ ca mahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:5744: 09,044.033c skandāya trīn anucarān dadau viṣṇur mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5747: 09,044.035a kundanaṃ kusumaṃ caiva kumudaṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5751: 09,044.037a suvrataṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ ca dadau mitro mahātmane
GE07mbh_09_u:5754: 09,044.038c suprabhaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ śubhakarmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5757: 09,044.039c pūṣā ca pārṣadau prādāt kārttikeyāya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:5764: 09,044.043a kāñcanaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ meghamālinam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5766: 09,044.044a sthiraṃ cātisthiraṃ caiva merur evāparau dadau
GE07mbh_09_u:5772: 09,044.047a unmādaṃ puṣpadantaṃ ca śaṅkukarṇaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5776: 09,044.049a evaṃ sādhyāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5777: 09,044.049c sāgarāḥ saritaś caiva girayaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5780: 09,044.051a śṛṇu nāmāni cānyeṣāṃ ye 'nye skandasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5782: 09,044.052a śaṅkukarṇo nikumbhaś ca padmaḥ kumuda eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5791: 09,044.056c jvālājihvaḥ karālaś ca sitakeśo jaṭī hariḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5798: 09,044.059c dhūmraḥ śvetaḥ kaliṅgaś ca siddhārtho varadas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5799: 09,044.060a priyakaś caiva nandaś ca gonandaś ca pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:5800: 09,044.060c ānandaś ca pramodaś ca svastiko dhruvakas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:5801: 09,044.061a kṣemavāpaḥ sujātaś ca siddhayātraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:5803: 09,044.062a gāyano hasanaś caiva bāṇaḥ khaḍgaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:5806: 09,044.063c raṇotkaṭaḥ prahāsaś ca śvetaśīrṣaś ca nandakaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:8077: 09,062.046c mā ca doṣaṃ mahārāja pāṇḍaveṣu niveśaya
GE07mbh_09_u:8079: 09,062.047c dharmato nyāyataś caiva snehataś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:8080: 09,062.048a etat sarvaṃ tu vijñāya ātmadoṣakṛtaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:8081: 09,062.048c asūyāṃ pāṇḍuputreṣu na bhavān kartum arhati
GE07mbh_09_u:8082: 09,062.049a kulaṃ vaṃśaś ca piṇḍaś ca yac ca putrakṛtaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:8084: 09,062.049d*0386_01 tvaṃ caiva naraśārdūla gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_09_u:8085: 09,062.049d*0386_02 mā śuco naraśārdūla pāṇḍavān prati kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_09_u:8086: 09,062.050a etat sarvam anudhyātvā ātmanaś ca vyatikramam
GE07mbh_09_u:8087: 09,062.050c śivena pāṇḍavān dhyāhi namas te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:8088: 09,062.051a jānāsi ca mahābāho dharmarājasya yā tvayi
GE07mbh_09_u:8090: 09,062.052a etac ca kadanaṃ kṛtvā śatrūṇām apakāriṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:8091: 09,062.052c dahyate sma divārātraṃ na ca śarmādhigacchati
GE07mbh_09_u:8092: 09,062.053a tvāṃ caiva naraśārdūla gāndhārīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:8093: 09,062.053c sa śocan bharataśreṣṭha na śāntim adhigacchati
GE07mbh_09_u:8098: 09,062.056a saubaleyi nibodha tvaṃ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi suvrate
GE07mbh_09_u:8099: 09,062.056c tvatsamā nāsti loke 'sminn adya sīmantinī śubhe
GE07mbh_09_u:8100: 09,062.057a jānāmi ca yathā rājñi sabhāyāṃ mama saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_09_u:8102: 09,062.057e uktavaty asi kalyāṇi na ca te tanayaiḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:8103: 09,062.058a duryodhanas tvayā cokto jayārthī paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8104: 09,062.058c śṛṇu mūḍha vaco mahyaṃ yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8105: 09,062.059a tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ tava vākyaṃ nṛpātmaje
GE07mbh_09_u:8106: 09,062.059c evaṃ viditvā kalyāṇi mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8107: 09,062.059e pāṇḍavānāṃ vināśāya mā te buddhiḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_09_u:8111: 09,062.061c evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi keśava
GE07mbh_09_u:8113: 09,062.062c sā me vyavasthitā śrutvā tava vākyaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:8114: 09,062.063a rājñas tv andhasya vṛddhasya hataputrasya keśava
GE07mbh_09_u:8115: 09,062.063c tvaṃ gatiḥ saha tair vīraiḥ pāṇḍavair dvipadāṃ vara
GE07mbh_09_u:8116: 09,062.064a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ mukhaṃ pracchādya vāsasā
GE07mbh_09_u:8120: 09,062.066a samāśvāsya ca gāndhārīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8122: 09,062.067a tatas tvarita utthāya pādau mūrdhnā praṇamya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:8124: 09,062.068a āpṛcche tvāṃ kuruśreṣṭha mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8126: 09,062.068e pāṇḍavānāṃ vadhe rātrau buddhis tena pradarśitā
GE07mbh_09_u:8127: 09,062.069a etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ gāndhāryā sahito 'bravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:8130: 09,062.070c bhūyas tvayā sameṣyāmi kṣipram eva janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:8131: 09,062.070e prāyāt tatas tu tvarito dārukeṇa sahācyutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8137: 09,062.073c tac ca tebhyaḥ samākhyāya sahitas taiḥ samāviśat
GE07mbh_09_u:8139: 09,063.001a adhiṣṭhitaḥ padā mūrdhni bhagnasaktho mahīṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8140: 09,063.001c śauṭīramānī putro me kāny abhāṣata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:8141: 09,063.002a atyarthaṃ kopano rājā jātavairaś ca pāṇḍuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:8142: 09,063.002c vyasanaṃ paramaṃ prāptaḥ kim āha paramāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:8145: 09,063.003c rājñā yad uktaṃ bhagnena tasmin vyasana āgate
GE07mbh_09_u:8147: 09,063.004c yamayan mūrdhajāṃs tatra vīkṣya caiva diśo daśa
GE07mbh_09_u:8148: 09,063.005a keśān niyamya yatnena niḥśvasann urago yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:8150: 09,063.006a bāhū dharaṇyāṃ niṣpiṣya muhur matta iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8151: 09,063.006c prakīrṇān mūrdhajān dhunvan dantair dantān upaspṛśan
GE07mbh_09_u:8153: 09,063.007a bhīṣme śāṃtanave nāthe karṇe cāstrabhṛtāṃ vare
GE07mbh_09_u:8154: 09,063.007c gautame śakunau cāpi droṇe cāstrabhṛtāṃ vare
GE07mbh_09_u:8155: 09,063.008a aśvatthāmni tathā śalye śūre ca kṛtavarmaṇi
GE07mbh_09_u:8156: 09,063.008b*0387_01 anyeṣv api ca śūreṣu nyastabhāro mahātmasu
GE07mbh_09_u:8157: 09,063.008c imām avasthāṃ prāpto 'smi kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8159: 09,063.009c kālaṃ prāpya mahābāho na kaś cid ativartate
GE07mbh_09_u:8163: 09,063.011c bhūriśravasi karṇe ca bhīṣme droṇe ca śrīmati
GE07mbh_09_u:8164: 09,063.012a idaṃ cākīrtijaṃ karma nṛśaṃsaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:8165: 09,063.012c yena te satsu nirvedaṃ gamiṣyantīti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8167: 09,063.013c ko vā samayabhettāraṃ budhaḥ saṃmantum arhati
GE07mbh_09_u:8168: 09,063.014a adharmeṇa jayaṃ labdhvā ko nu hṛṣyeta paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8170: 09,063.015a kiṃ nu citram atas tv adya bhagnasakthasya yan mama
GE07mbh_09_u:8172: 09,063.016a pratapantaṃ śriyā juṣṭaṃ vartamānaṃ ca bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:8173: 09,063.016c evaṃ kuryān naro yo hi sa vai saṃjaya pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8174: 09,063.017a abhijñau kṣatradharmasya mama mātā pitā ca me
GE07mbh_09_u:8175: 09,063.017c tau hi saṃjaya duḥkhārtau vijñāpyau vacanān mama
GE07mbh_09_u:8176: 09,063.018a iṣṭaṃ bhṛtyā bhṛtāḥ samyag bhūḥ praśāstā sasāgarā
GE07mbh_09_u:8177: 09,063.018c mūrdhni sthitam amitrāṇāṃ jīvatām eva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:8178: 09,063.019a dattā dāyā yathāśakti mitrāṇāṃ ca priyaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:8179: 09,063.019c amitrā bādhitāḥ sarve ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:8180: 09,063.020a yātāni pararāṣṭrāṇi nṛpā bhuktāś ca dāsavat
GE07mbh_09_u:8181: 09,063.020c priyebhyaḥ prakṛtaṃ sādhu ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:8182: 09,063.021a mānitā bāndhavāḥ sarve mānyaḥ saṃpūjito janaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8183: 09,063.021c tritayaṃ sevitaṃ sarvaṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:8185: 09,063.022c ājāneyais tathā yātaṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:8186: 09,063.023a adhītaṃ vidhivad dattaṃ prāptam āyur nirāmayam
GE07mbh_09_u:8187: 09,063.023c svadharmeṇa jitā lokāḥ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:8188: 09,063.024a diṣṭyā nāhaṃ jitaḥ saṃkhye parān preṣyavad āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8189: 09,063.024c diṣṭyā me vipulā lakṣmīr mṛte tv anyaṃ gatā vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:8191: 09,063.025c nidhanaṃ tan mayā prāptaṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:8192: 09,063.026a diṣṭyā nāhaṃ parāvṛtto vairāt prākṛtavaj jitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8193: 09,063.026c diṣṭyā na vimatiṃ kāṃ cid bhajitvā tu parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8194: 09,063.027a suptaṃ vātha pramattaṃ vā yathā hanyād viṣeṇa vā
GE07mbh_09_u:8197: 09,063.028c kṛpaḥ śāradvataś caiva vaktavyā vacanān mama
GE07mbh_09_u:8199: 09,063.029c viśvāsaṃ samayaghnānāṃ na yūyaṃ gantum arhatha
GE07mbh_09_u:8200: 09,063.030a vātikāṃś cābravīd rājā putras te satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8202: 09,063.031a so 'haṃ droṇaṃ svargagataṃ śalyakarṇāv ubhau tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:8207: 09,063.033c dauḥśāsaniṃ ca vikrāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cātmajāv ubhau
GE07mbh_09_u:8208: 09,063.034a etāṃś cānyāṃś ca subahūn madīyāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8210: 09,063.035a kathaṃ bhrātṝn hatāñ śrutvā bhartāraṃ ca svasā mama
GE07mbh_09_u:8212: 09,063.036a snuṣābhiḥ prasnuṣābhiś ca vṛddho rājā pitā mama
GE07mbh_09_u:8219: 09,063.039c ahaṃ nidhanam āsādya lokān prāpsyāmi śāśvatān
GE07mbh_09_u:8221: 09,063.040c pralāpaṃ nṛpateḥ śrutvā vidravanti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_09_u:8226: 09,063.043a tad ākhyāya tataḥ sarve droṇaputrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:8228: 09,063.043c dhyātvā ca suciraṃ kālaṃ jagmur ārtā yathāgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:8230: 09,064.001a vātikānāṃ sakāśāt tu śrutvā duryodhanaṃ hatam
GE07mbh_09_u:8233: 09,064.002c aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8244: 09,064.007c vṛtaṃ bhūtagaṇair ghoraiḥ kravyādaiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8247: 09,064.008c sāmarṣaṃ taṃ naravyāghraṃ vyāghraṃ nipatitaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:8248: 09,064.009a te tu dṛṣṭvā maheṣvāsā bhūtale patitaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:8251: 09,064.010c duryodhanaṃ ca saṃprekṣya sarve bhūmāv upāviśan
GE07mbh_09_u:8254: 09,064.012a na nūnaṃ vidyate 'sahyaṃ mānuṣye kiṃ cid eva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:8255: 09,064.012c yatra tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra śeṣe pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8256: 09,064.013a bhūtvā hi nṛpatiḥ pūrvaṃ samājñāpya ca medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:8257: 09,064.013c katham eko 'dya rājendra tiṣṭhase nirjane vane
GE07mbh_09_u:8258: 09,064.014a duḥśāsanaṃ na paśyāmi nāpi karṇaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:8259: 09,064.014c nāpi tān suhṛdaḥ sarvān kim idaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:8260: 09,064.015a duḥkhaṃ nūnaṃ kṛtāntasya gatiṃ jñātuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:8261: 09,064.015c lokānāṃ ca bhavān yatra śete pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8263: 09,064.016c satṛṇaṃ grasate pāṃsuṃ paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_09_u:8264: 09,064.017a kva te tad amalaṃ chatraṃ vyajanaṃ kva ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_09_u:8265: 09,064.017c sā ca te mahatī senā kva gatā pārthivottama
GE07mbh_09_u:8270: 09,064.017d*0390_03 kva gatāḥ pārthivendrādya saubhrātraṃ ca samāśritam
GE07mbh_09_u:8275: 09,064.018c yad vai lokagurur bhūtvā bhavān etāṃ daśāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8277: 09,064.019b*0391_01 dhruveva bhāti sarvatra nityaṃ mohakarī nṛṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:8279: 09,064.019b*0391_03 na tu viśvasen nityāṃ vai hy adhruvā vai svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8281: 09,064.019d*0392_01 imaṃ lokam anityaṃ vā hy adyāhaṃ samacintaye
GE07mbh_09_u:8282: 09,064.020a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitasya viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8283: 09,064.020c uvāca rājan putras te prāptakālam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8284: 09,064.021a vimṛjya netre pāṇibhyāṃ śokajaṃ bāṣpam utsṛjan
GE07mbh_09_u:8285: 09,064.021c kṛpādīn sa tadā vīrān sarvān eva narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8288: 09,064.023a so 'yaṃ māṃ samanuprāptaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavatāṃ hi yaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8290: 09,064.024a diṣṭyā nāhaṃ parāvṛtto yuddhe kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_09_u:8291: 09,064.024b*0393_01 diṣṭyāhaṃ no nṛpatibhir nirjito na kadā cana
GE07mbh_09_u:8292: 09,064.024b*0393_02 diṣṭyā mayā nirjitās te rājāno bahuśo yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:8296: 09,064.025a utsāhaś ca kṛto nityaṃ mayā diṣṭyā yuyutsatā
GE07mbh_09_u:8297: 09,064.025b*0395_01 diṣṭyā hatā gajā yuddhe sagajārohakā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:8304: 09,064.025b*0395_08 diṣṭyā mamāyudhāny āśu nāśam āyānti vai kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:8306: 09,064.026a diṣṭyā ca vo 'haṃ paśyāmi muktān asmāj janakṣayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:8307: 09,064.026b*0396_01 svasti haṃto tv ahaṃ yuddhe nihatajñātibāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8308: 09,064.026c svastiyuktāṃś ca kalyāṃś ca tan me priyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:8310: 09,064.027c yadi vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ vo jitā lokā mayākṣayāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8312: 09,064.028c tena na cyāvitaś cāhaṃ kṣatradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt
GE07mbh_09_u:8313: 09,064.029a sa mayā samanuprāpto nāsmi śocyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:8314: 09,064.029b*0397_01 tathā tu dṛṣṭvā rājendra vartate vijayo mama
GE07mbh_09_u:8316: 09,064.029e yatitaṃ vijaye nityaṃ daivaṃ tu duratikramam
GE07mbh_09_u:8318: 09,064.030c tūṣṇīṃ babhūva rājendra rujāsau vihvalo bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:8320: 09,064.031c drauṇiḥ krodhena jajvāla yathā vahnir jagatkṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:8321: 09,064.032a sa tu krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ pāṇau pāṇiṃ nipīḍya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:8323: 09,064.033a pitā me nihataḥ kṣudraiḥ sunṛśaṃsena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:8324: 09,064.033c na tathā tena tapyāmi yathā rājaṃs tvayādya vai
GE07mbh_09_u:8325: 09,064.034a śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mahyaṃ satyena vadataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:8327: 09,064.034b*0398_02 tava priyaṃ kariṣyāmi kṛtvā kāryam anuttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:8328: 09,064.034b*0398_03 īpsitaṃ manasā rājan yathecchasi tathā vada
GE07mbh_09_u:8330: 09,064.034d*0399_01 śapeyaṃ rājaśārdūla pādābhyāṃ mama vai pituḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8337: 09,064.035e anujñāṃ tu mahārāja bhavān me dātum arhati
GE07mbh_09_u:8338: 09,064.036a iti śrutvā tu vacanaṃ droṇaputrasya kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8339: 09,064.036b*0402_01 tac chrutvā vacanaṃ drauṇer dhṛtarāṣṭra tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8342: 09,064.037a sa tad vacanam ājñāya rājño brāhmaṇasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8344: 09,064.038a tam abravīn mahārāja putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:8346: 09,064.038e senāpatyena bhadraṃ te mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_09_u:8348: 09,064.039c vartatā kṣatradharmeṇa hy evaṃ dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8349: 09,064.040a rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:8355: 09,064.043a apakramya tu te tūrṇaṃ tasmād āyodhanān nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:8358: 09,064.043d*0403_02 āste rājā cintayānas teṣām āgamanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_09_u:8360: 09,064.043d*0403_04 brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścād vaktāraṃ ca supūjayet
